27b4(mdo): can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so// kun dam spro ba'i le'u bstand pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags brgyang khri bzhi stong gis myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam
27b5(mdo): pa bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur da to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ki rnam par sprul ba/ bstand pa// / kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 
27b6(mdo): nyi shu sa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal dpa/ rigs kyi bu dag sngon byung ba
27b7(mdo): pa'i byas na skal pa grangs myed par gyur da pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od gzer gyis brgyand par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
27b8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul pa'i Sh+Tha lo sbyang ba/ thar byed pa/ \u0f88\u0f90 dang byi rnams kyi smon da / sangs rgyas po chom sngon 'das la/ 
28a1(mdo): sgra dbum skan skam ma'i rgyal po ye tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rabs la rgyas/ 
28a2(mdo): po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge' ba bkod pa de'i chung ma dri ma myed pas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de// rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la bu gnyis yod de
28a3(mdo): gcig gi mying ni dri ma myed pa'i snying po/ gcig gi myi de ni dri ma myed pa'i myig ste/ khye'u de gnyis pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan/ shes rab dang ldan/ bsod nams dang ldan/ ye shes dang ldan te/ byang
28a4(mdo): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtsond par gyur da to// 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang
28a5(mdo): bcon 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan / pha rold tu phyind dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa dang / byams pa dang
28a6(mdo): snying rje dang / dgal ba dang / btang ba snyoms dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu pa bdun dag la brtson par 'gyur da to// thams cad kyi pha rol tu skyond par gyurd to// dri ma myed pa'i ting nge
28a7(mdo): 'dzind kyi pha rol tu song ngo // sgyu skar dang skar ma dang / nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu song ngo // dri ma myed pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu song ngo / dri ma myed pa'i 'od gsal ba'o ting nge 'dzin
28a8(mdo): kyi pha rol tu song ngo // dpa' rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rold tu spyod do// gzi brjid chen po'i ting de 'dzind kyi pha rol tu song bar gyur da to// bcom ldan 'das de yang de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can de
28b1(mdo): dag sa zhugs brtse ba dang / rgyal po dge ba bkod pa des thugs la che ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos pad ma la dkar po'i chos kyi nam grangs 'di stond to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma myed pa'i snying po dang
28b2(mdo): khyes dril myed pa'i myig bdag cag skyed pa'i mags pa der song ste byin nas/ sor lo bcus thal mo srung da te bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yum tshur skyon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28b3(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i skad du/ bcom
28b4(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag parags pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyas/ zo me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bgud // de mi'i
28b5(mdo): slad du zhe na/ yum bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de
28b6(mdo): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dam pa'i chos padama' dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chad kyis/ de mnyan pa'i phyir bzhud do// rigs kyi bu dag de skad ces smras nas
28b7(mdo): rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma myed pas byin pas/ khye'u dri ma myed pa'i snying po dang / dri ma myed pa'i myig la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi pha rgyal po dge bkod pa 'di bram ze la dang / 
28b8(mdo): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba'i phyir 'gror myi ste da to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma myed pa'i snying po dang / khye'u dri ma myed pa'i myig gis sor mo bcu la thal mo sbyar nas
29a1(mdo): bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag log par lta ba'i khyim tu skyes ste bdag cag chos kyi rgyal po'i bu ma lags pa lta/ rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po'i chung ma
29a2(mdo): drim byed pas byin pas khyelu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis bdag cag gi rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la stong brtse ba'i phyir cho 'phrul dacung bad cig legs pa ru ston da cig dang
29a3(mdo): khyed la dad par gyur da pa yang srid kyis sems can dad par gyur dan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po ma
29a4(mdo): tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i kun tu 'dod tu gnang ngo // rigs kyi lud ka de nas khye'u dri ma byed pa'i snying po dang / khye'u drim myed pa'i myig gis de'i tshe ta la bdun srid du nam mkhal sa
29a5(mdo): 'phags nas pa rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la snying paba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i cho 'phrul zung du byed de/ de dag bar sdang de las dong nas nyal bar byed do// bar snad de
29a6(mdo): 26ka ko/ bar snang de la rdul spug go// bar snad de nyid la lus kyi spyad ngas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing lus kyi stod nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do// lus kyi spyod nas chu'i rgyar gtong zhing
29a7(mdo): las kyi sred nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bab byed do// de dag ra ma mkha' de nyid la chen por gyur nas chu ngur gyur de/ chu drung gyur danas chen por gyur to/ bang snang de nyid las kyi spang bar gyur du te
29a8(mdo): sa yas byung ngo // sa las byung nas nam mkha' la 'phags so// rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de snyed kyis rang kyi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa pra tu med to// rigs kyi
29b1(mdo): bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas khye'u de gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag mthong nas// de'i tshe tshim zhing mgul yid rangs ste rab tu dgal zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ sor
29b2(mdo): mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ khye'u de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi ston pa su/ khyed su'i slob ma zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge ba
29b3(mdo): bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
29b4(mdo): kun tu rgyas pa de bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ka zhes pa'i rin po/ che'i byang chub kyi shing drung na chos kyi bdan la bzhugs te/ lha dang / bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig
29b5(mdo): rten gi mdun na dam pa'i chos dpa ma' dkar po'i chos rnamarma/ ngas rgyas par rab tu 'chad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag rtsag gi stond pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag ni de'i slob
29b6(mdo): ma'o// rigs kyi dag de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas khye'u do gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi stond pa la lta zhing bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du bdag kyang 'gro'o// 
29b7(mdo): de rigs kyi bu de nas khye'u de gnyis par snang de las babs nas/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma ga la ba der song ste/ byiphyin nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so// 
29b8(mdo): yum bdag cag gis yab 'di zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btul lags so// bdag cag gri yab kyi ston pa'i bgyi po bgyis so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das las rab tu
30a1(mdo): 6byungang/ yum da ni bdag cag btang ba'i rigs so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khyen dri ma skyid pa'i snying po dang / khyis dri ma byed pa'i phyag gis de'i tshe re'i bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la chags su 'an
30a2(mdo): pa 'di dag smras so// khyim byed rab tu byung ba ni/ yum gyis bdag cag gnang bar mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed par dkal// bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bgyi/ u hu ba ra'i me tog sbyar/ rgyas na
30a3(mdo): shinan tu rked par dkal// dal ba 'byor pa'ang rnyed dka' bas// rab tu 'byung gis btang tu gsol// rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma myed pas byin pas smras pa// de ring khyed gnyis gtang par bya/ byis pa bad/ 
30a4(mdo): cag legs par deng // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dka' bas / bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya// rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de/ dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras pa nas
30a5(mdo): bdag gi pha dang ma de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum legs so tshur la skyon khyed dang thams cad lhan cig/ bzhud do// bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba
30a6(mdo): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sma dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i
30a7(mdo): drung du bzhud do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab yum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/ u huM bo ri'i me tog dang 'dra zhing kanya shing gi lu kar ru sbal gyi maman pa chung bar dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// 
30a8(mdo): yab yum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dga' byung ba nyed par dka' ste// de bas na yab yum bdag cag bsod nams mchog gis brtan pa'i gsung rab 'di lta bu la skyes te/ yab yum bdag ca
30b1(mdo): btang ba legs te/ bdag cag mchi zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs stan skar ma rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i bstan
30b2(mdo): ba la rab tu 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab yum de bzhin gshegs pa mthong brnyed par dka' ba dang / da skar gyi dus na 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi rgyal po rnyed par dkal ba dang / 'di lta bu chas kyi
30b3(mdo): dal 'byor da pa shim tu rnyed par dka' ba'i srad du'o// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe na rgyal po'i dge ba bkod pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor las/ sras brgyad khri bzhi stong dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam
30b4(mdo): grangs 'di'i snod du gyur da to// khye'u dri ma myed pa'i myig dang dri ma myed pa'i snying pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la s+yad de bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ngan song thams cad ji lta bsal ba bsnyam nas
30b5(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad sel pa'i ti/ da nge 'dzind la spyad par gyur da to// khye'u de dag gis dri ma myed/ pas byin pa rgyal po'i chung ma de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
30b6(mdo): kun nas bstan pa/ sangs rgyas thams kyi chos gsang ba'i ka nas shes so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge bo bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la btu lang te/ zhugs
30b7(mdo): par byas nas/ yongs su srind par byas te/ gnyer la dab dang rgyal po'i chung ma drim phyed pas sbyin pa de dang rje/ gnyen mang ba dang / rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i byes de gnyis kyang rmos bani khrig nyis stong dang / 
30b8(mdo): btsun po'i 'khor dang bcas/ thong po dang bcas te sems cad 'grogs nas lhan cig chu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs stan skar ma'i
31a1(mdo): rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa ka la ba der dong ste phyind nas pa bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mo blo phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du skor ba byas nas phyogs
31a2(mdo): gcig tu 'khod do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa des/ rgyal po dge
31a3(mdo): ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas te lhags par mkhyen nas chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan da/ yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug/ yang dag par gzengs pa stod/ yang dag par rab tu dka' bar
31a4(mdo): mdzad do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgya la po dge ba bkod pa la chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan da/ yang dag par 'ja nad tu bcug/ yang dag
31a5(mdo): par gzengs bstodayang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pas/ de'i tshe cham zhing mgul la yi rang ste/ rab tu dag/ la zhing dka' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas nu bo cod pan gyis
31a6(mdo): bcings te rgyal por bcug nas/ bu dang gnyen ma dpa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dang rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma myed pas byin / de yang bud myed kyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dang / khye'u de gnyis dang ldan
31a7(mdo): cig tu srog chags brgya khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
31a8(mdo): pa de'i gsung rab la dad pas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung ste/ rab tu byung nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsam
31b1(mdo): ba dang nos pa dang kun chub par bya ba sa brtso pa gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas tum po das pa bkod pas kyad zhi ba'i stong 'das pa nam yon tan kyi rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'di da thob ste/ 
31b2(mdo): ting nge 'dzin de thos sa thag tu de 'i rnam mkhams pas bcun rtsa cu bags so// de nas rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dam sa la yi kyis du btuganas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dmas
31b3(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan sngar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gso lang to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bu 'di gnyis ston pa lags te/ gang 'di dag gas
31b4(mdo): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis lta bar gyu rad pa chen po de las bzlog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan ba la rab tu bzhag go// yongs su spyi dbyar bgyis zhugs par bgyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa
31b5(mdo): la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba'i slad tu yang bskul to// bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i sa pa dran par bgyi ba'i srad du/ bu'i gzugs kyis bdag
31b6(mdo): kyi khyim du skyes so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ rgyal po dge
31b7(mdo): pa bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsald to// rgyal po chen po de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni srid pa'i 'gro ba dpa' chi 'pho ba'i gnas thams
31b8(mdo): cad du skyes par yang / gang dag smon pa byed pas nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu stod pa dang / brdud ba dang yongs su sridad par byed pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams
32a1(mdo): nyid sra bar 'gyur ngo to// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zind pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'dzud pa/ gnas 'di ni rgya chen po 'o// rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis
32a2(mdo): mthong ngam/ gso lang pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsa la pa/ rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
32a3(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung drug cu rtsa lnga'i byed ma snyed la mchod pa byed do// sems can rnams la ni snyi sa che ba'i phyir log par lta ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la
32a4(mdo): bcor 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po 'i chos kyi nam grangs 'di 'dzinang par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal/ po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ sor mo bcu
32a5(mdo): thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces
32a6(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi srad du dbu'i gtsug to rnam par mdzes shi
32a7(mdo): spyan dri ma mchis pa lags/ sprin mtshams kyi mdzod su mdzes shing zla ba dang dung ltar dkar la mdzes/ mnyam zhing thags bzang ba'i tshems kyi 'phreng ba zhal gyi nang nas mdzes bcom ldan 'das kyi spros me
32a8(mdo): tog bim pa ltar dbang ba dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan mdzes pa de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/ rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas yon tan de snyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
32b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun turgyas pa de la mngon par bstod nas/ yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan dag gis kyang bcod/ 
32b2(mdo): ldan 'das de la bstod de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar pa'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
32b3(mdo): 'das rim ma cu de bzhini gshegs pa'i brtan pa di da men yon tan bams kyis kyi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'ongs bdul ba gsungs te/ jitsab tu de bzhin gshegs pa bslab pa legs par bcas pa na ngomaca dad to// 
32b4(mdo): ldan 'das deng skad cang bdag srang sems kyi mang bar du ma chi sang kyi bgyis// srar log pangs pa'i dbang tu 'chi bar gyi 'gyi'o// mra no na pa'i dbang du mchi bar kyi bgyim// slar sdig pa'i sems bskyed
32b5(mdo): pa'i dbang du mchi bar myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag myi dge pa'i chos 'di snyed dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du mchid myi 'tshal lo zhes smras te/ des bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa
32b6(mdo): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bar snang la song ste 'dug ko// de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang
32b7(mdo): rgyal mo'i chu sa dri ma byed pas byin pas des 'argya stong 'i ba'i mu tig gi rkyen 'bred bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi bar sna la gtor nga to// mu tig gi rgyan 'gred de dag gtong dam thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du mu cig/ 
32b8(mdo): ki kyar 'breng gi khang ya ba legs pa kru bzhi snyam/ ka la bzhi thug pa/ ngos mnyam gzhin byanam par bye ba/ bsan sug pa/ gnas par gyur te/ khang pa 'artsegs 'de bangs bcos su 'argya stong tu ma bting dzin
33a1(mdo): 'i byung ngo // 'i de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkyis mo krung bcas te bzhugs par snang ngo // de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di ni mthu che zhing de
33a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan pas kyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku khang pa brtsegs pa'i dpyas na mdzes shing ltar sdug pa kha dog bzang pos rgyas pa mchod dang ldan pang ka da'o// 
33a3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa 'khor bzhi po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa' nam mkha'i dkyil na
33a4(mdo): 'dug cing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po dge pa bkod pas nga'i bston pa la dge slong gi tshul bya byas
33a5(mdo): nas/ bskal pa mngon par 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba la la/ jog rten gyi khams yongs ldan du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
33a6(mdo): zhes su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes pu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa lha dang myi rnams kyi ston/ pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal
33a7(mdo): po'i zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byum ste// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu myed
33a8(mdo): pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu myed par 'gyur / ro// 'jig rten gyi khams yangs ldan yang dag lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ltar de bzhin gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
33b1(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas de yo tan pas sa kyis kyi byeb du gyung // rigs kyi tha dag rim pa de'i byas nams bdeg pa bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ga'an nas yid lags bya byed mom yam mchol mal par sgru
33b2(mdo): ma sa byed kyis des rgyas ma/ zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ched pa 'ad pa'i dpal 'ani nyid rdo sa rgyal po dag pa kod pa zhes byabar gyur te// ris kyi tha pa
33b3(mdo): 'dri de'i dus nargyas po'i chung ma dris byed pas byin pa zhes bya ba mya ngab drag zhan zhig yin pa sgyus du khyed so ma gnyi'am yi gnyis sa ma the cos dpa par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis ma/ 
33b4(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po rnam/ par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal po 'i rgyu ma dri ma myed pas byin pa zhes
33b5(mdo): bya bar byu da te/ rgyal po dge bcan dam dpa sems can dedag ni stong brtse ba'i phyir/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i chung sa las grangs 'ar 'gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus da/ khyes de ga
33b6(mdo): su gyur rad pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du khyed so ma nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tsom la za bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi rgyal po dang / smang yang dag
33b7(mdo): 'phags 'di gnyis de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i dge ba bkod pa de'i bur gyur da to// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman yang dga' phags yon tan bsam gyis
33b8(mdo): myi khyab pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// skyes bya dam pa 'di gnyis ka yang bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i chos kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'o// kar dag skyes bu/ 
34a1(mdo): dam pa 'di gnyis kyi mying 'din pa de dag mams cad kyang sgra dang brtsam pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag byas par 'gyur ro// spo gi sbyong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pan thog chags brgya'i bzhi sgo bcos rnams la chos kyi
34a2(mdo): myig rtul myed cing dri ma bye dang bral ba rnam par dag go// / rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu ma lnga pa'o// / de nas byang chub
34a3(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun dra ba dang nas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yi me dang / 
34a4(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa gang gis kyang yongs su bsko da cing mdun du ba dar te/ lhan/ cig tu shar phyogs nas zhing dag ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/ pad ma
34a5(mdo): yi char ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong ni rab tu lend cing byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub se mas dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpam
34a6(mdo): mu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i che ba 'i nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid cen po 'bar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'brus chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / 
34a7(mdo): gnod snyid dang dri ba dang lha ma min dang / nam mkha' lding dang / kyi ma ci dang / zho 'byechen po dang / byi dang pyim yin pa'i rnam par 'phrul bachen po dang / de sang mu 'phrul gyi po 'bras pasas kyis kyi khyan bdag gis byang rum
34a8(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed 'dir byin nas/ de de'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhes la
34b1(mdo): mgo bos phyag 'tshal dang te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgyan bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das bdag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ga ni/ 
34b2(mdo): 'arjid mngon 'phags rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dir mchis ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gi khams phyi mchen 'din/ dam pa'i pa ma dkar po'i chos kyi nam grangs 'di bstan pa de mnyan pa'i wang su/ bcom
34b3(mdo): ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pags kyi thum pa'i rgyab tu bad / mam/ ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brgya tho 'di snyed 'di dag kyang das ma mas bdas dag ba chos kyinam dgrangs 'di gnad pa'i sad du/ 
34b4(mdo): mchis so// de'i slad tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ dma'i chos padra mra dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpal sems dpal
34b5(mdo): chen po 'di 'a rnams la rgya chen logs par bshad du gsold/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems da/ pa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka
34b6(mdo): stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dag ni mgo smos pa tsam gyis don khong du chud pa sha stag go// dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di lta ste// de bzhin
34b7(mdo): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer myed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gos lad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ltar lags so// 
34b8(mdo): de nas 'khor der dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dus pa de dag dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam kras 'di la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir/ yang bcom ldan 'das
35a1(mdo): kyis/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po kun tu babang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i bud myed kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma'i dkar po'i chos kyi rnam
35a2(mdo): mangs 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen 'di sa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i ma pa bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / nges pa'i phung po la gnas
35a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur da pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i bud myed kyis dam
35a4(mdo): pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol do// 
35a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa za ma la mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzind pa'i dge slong rnams la srung par bgyi'o// bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// tshad pa spang bar
35a6(mdo): bgyi'o// dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// ci nas kyang chos sba ba de dag la klags lta ba dang / skabs tshol ba gang gis kyang glags myi rnyed par 'gyung ba dang / btud sdig can dang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi ras
35a7(mdo): kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / brgyad kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud kyi 'khor brags lta ba dang skabs tshol ba rnams kyis klags kyi rnyed par 'gyur ba na bdud kyi kun nas ldang ba'i bar tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu dang / 
35a8(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / yid dgas dang / srul po dang / gshed byed dbang sA dras dag chos sba ba de la grags sa pa dang / skabs rol na yang skabs nyed par gyi 'argya bas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba de sa ta ka 'a
35b1(mdo): mthas sa sa bsrung ba chor// sem ldan 'das sang gi chos smra ma mas kyi sa sangs 'dis sems shing rnam sa kyang bsoran pa dang / 'dag pas zhugs pas gyur pa dang mings kyi rnam mas
35b2(mdo): bgyi'o// gang gi mi chos smra ba la de tsas kyi rnam dgrangs 'di la sems shing rnal 'byor kyi rjes su zhugs pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las zan tshig dang yi ge gcig tsam yang yan 'gal no dad par gyur/ 
35b3(mdo): pa de'i ma 'das grangs che'i rgyal po zhes da rje bcwa'atshas nas chos smra ba de la bdag ngos dang // chos kyi rnam ma sa 'di sa nyams par thos su ma la to/ 
35b4(mdo): bdag gi yum mtho pan chos kyi nam grangs 'di sa rnams ra bdag las thos nas/ ma shing masul yid dngas te dang tu dka' zhing dga' ba dang med 'de sa skyes nas chos kyi
35b5(mdo): ngas 'di la brtson 'grus ma so// bdag sam ngas thog tsa ting nge 'dzid dathob par 'gyung // gzungs makyil ba zhes bya bzhig zungs thobapar 'gyur ngo ro// bye ba brgya sto du ma
35b6(mdo): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sgra thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das spad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus lnga brgya ba tha ma la dge slong ngam
35b7(mdo): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas dge bsnyen ma kar dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ker 'dri ba dang mdo sde 'di lta bu tshol ba dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu klog pa dang
36a1(mdo): gang dag slad ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi nam gras 'di'i ched du gdugs bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu 'chag cing brtson par 'gyur na/ de dag la bdag gis sems can zas/ 
36a2(mdo): cad kyis mthong na dka' ba'i lus bstan par bgyi'o// glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshalang te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskod nas/ gdugs nyi shu cha gcig pa la
36a3(mdo): chos smra ba'i de dag 'chag pa'i thad tu mchi'o// mchis nas chos smra ba de dag la yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par 'dzind tu stsa la par bgyi'o// yang dag par bstsal par bgyi'o/ 
36a4(mdo): yang dag par gzer bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o// de dag la gzungs kyang stsal par bgyi'o// de ci nas kyang chos smra ba de dag la sus kyang myi
36a5(mdo): tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / de dag la myi 'am myi ma lags/ pas grags myi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / bud myed kyis 'phrog/ sa par myi 'gyur bar de dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o// 
36a6(mdo): mede legs su 'gyur ba nargyam/ rang pa sang bam bkyi'o// tsug gnyis par mgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos smra la de dag la bdag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'dri dag sa la bang brgyas// soms/ 
36a7(mdo): 'das gzungs lags kyi 'di dag gsan tu gsoyod// tu byung/ ma dad de/ da pa ti/ da ba kan/ dan sha yi/ ras sung / sa kyang dzi/ murta ba te/ zung chub byad/ rA
36a8(mdo): ba ta ne/ sangs pa yin te/ sang kA ni rak+sha ta ne/ rnam pa'i kau te/ sa thas gdu ta go sug lhan ga te/ si pa pa kri ci te/ ma chu ba te/ a r+tha ba d+ha/ badz+ran/ bahA ma'i/ swA hA// / bcom ldan
36b1(mdo): gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i gang ki na pa'i dbang po la grags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i byind kyi rlabs su rig par 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
36b2(mdo): dab pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' ga bdag gi lag tu thob par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
36b3(mdo): kun tu bzang po'i margya dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mthu'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po li gzi brjid kyis dpa' ba'i chos pad ma kang tho mchos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gi sa/ 
36b4(mdo): tu thob pa snyam gyi de ltar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ka/ bdag mdo 'di yi ger 'brib dang 'dzind pa'i sems cad de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob par 'gyuraro// 
36b5(mdo): sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i pha ba'i ba/ skyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni de ba zhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs par 'gyur ro// 
36b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag kyang dga' bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// gang dag mdo 'di yi ger 'drir brtsond pa dang / gang dag 'di'i don khong du chud par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mdo 'di yi ger 'dri ba de dag
36b7(mdo): 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal dpa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ skyes ma thag tu de'i drung ngu lha'i bu mo brgya khri bzhi stong mchi 'ang 'gyur/ lha'i bu de dag nga po che tsam gyi chod pan dang / 
36b8(mdo): lha'i bu mo de dag gi nang na gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger bris pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di 'dra ba lags na/ gang dag lung nod pa dang kha don bgyid pa dang / sems pa dang
37a1(mdo): yid la ba byed pa lta smos kya ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i rmo k+Shi rngam grangs 'di sems kyis kun nas bsas sa te/ yi ger bri bar bgyi'o// gang myi g.ye
37a2(mdo): bar yid la bgyid pas yi ger bris na de las sangs rgyas stong phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshe yang sangs rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mchi bar myi 'gyur ro// 'di nas she
37a3(mdo): 'phos nas kyang dka' ldan gyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ gangan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa mtshan bzang po sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de byang chub sems dpa'i
37a4(mdo): tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing lha'i bu mo bye ba khag zhig sa/ gis bdun gyis bskas nyi ma 'phar pa der skye'o// de lta lags pa rigs kyi chu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'amakhas pas cos ldadus
37a5(mdo): dgar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gus par yi ger brib par gyi'o// gus par lung mnod par bgyi'o// gus par kha ton du bgyi'o// gus par/ yid la 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
37a6(mdo): byis pa dang / byas rnanas pa dang / gyis pa dang / rgan mas pa dang / 'dis bgyis pa ni da gang ba na ga tus ma pas gyur// sol ma sa de sa lags pas rig kyi zulas gis kyis
37b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpas sems dpa' chedan po kun tu bzang po ma kun tu 'azang pos khyod skye ba mang po sa pan tham gyi zhugs pa dang / 'di ltar bsas kyis kyi khyab po mas dang ldan deng sbyang chen pos yidang pa'i klas pa
37b2(mdo): bsam pa dang / bsas kyis kyi khyab pas 'a nang pa'i sems bskyed pas khyod kyis chos sA pa de dag la byind kyis rlob par byed pa legs so legs po zhes legs so zhes bya ba rkyen na// rigs kyi bu gang sa la dag byang chub seMs/ 
37b3(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mying 'dzin pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
37b4(mdo): 'di yang ma ldan 'das gag ma thub pa'i gas mamam pa dang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gag kya zum pa mchod pa dang / de ma / gshegs pa shas kyi thus pas chos bstan pa legs so zhes byang
37b5(mdo): byin pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yid rang ba dang / de ba zhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas de dag gi phyi bor phyag bzhag pa dang de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la chos gos kyis gsog
37b6(mdo): par rig par bya'o// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi yul pa rigs kyi zhu ma de dog de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa 'ji nad par rig par bya'o// de dag 'jig rten rgyang phan pa la dga' bar gyi 'gyur ro// de dag stan dang gas la
37b7(mdo): zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la dga' bar myi 'gyur ro// de dag gang byed pa dang rol mo byed pa dang gyad dpa' tshong dang / shan pa dang / bya gag 'tshong ba dang / phag 'tshong ba dang / bud myed ga so ba'i sems can rnams la dga' bar
37b8(mdo): phyi 'gyur ro// mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pa dang yi ger bris pa dang / 'dzi med pa dang grags pa de dag gzhan la sred par myi 'gyur ro// sems can de dag chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag so so bdag nyid tshul
38a1(mdo): bzhin yad la byed par 'gyur ro// rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// de dge slong gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzind
38a2(mdo): pa de dag 'dod chags kyis gzi dad par myi 'gyur ro// zhe sdang myed pa dang / gti mug myed pa dang / ser sna myed pa dang / 'chab pa myed pa dang / nga rgyal myed pa dang / che ba'i nga rgyal myed pa dang / log pa'i nga rgyal myed par
38a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po chos smra ba la de dag gi rnyed pas chog shes par 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po gang dag gis phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
38a4(mdo): 'di 'dzi nad pa'i dge slong mthong na 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang di ni bdud kyi zab mo 'tshogs las rgyas thar 'gyur ro// rigs
38a5(mdo): kyi bu 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// 'di na sa kyi datung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni chos kyi drung 'bud par 'gyur ro// 'di ni chos kyi chang chen po 'arab tu 'bebs par 'gyu bar/ 
38a6(mdo): 'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khre la 'dug par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gang dag phyi ma'i dus phyi ba'i tshe lnga brgya pa za ma la chos kyi rnam thadra 'di 'dzind pa'i dge slong de dag brkam par myi 'gyur ro// 
38a7(mdo): mgom la chags padang/ srung ba 'a la chags par kyi 'byung ngo // chos sna pa de dag drang pong 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de dag nam par ya da pa gsum thob par 'gyung ngo // de dag gi tshe 'di la 'phrog par ma
38a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// gang dag mdo po 'di 'dzin pa chos sna pa'i dge slong rnams mongs par byed pa'i sems can de dag dbum yong du 'gyur ro// gang dag gis mdo sde 'dis su 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnamasas kyi
38b1(mdo): snyan par bsgrags na/ de dag tshe 'di nyid la lus la sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ker 'dri ba rnams la 'phya ba dang snying pa de dag so chag par 'gyur ro// so thags ngan par la
38b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// mchu gyi sdug par 'byung ngo // sA leb bar 'gyur ro// lag pa dang rkang pa log par 'gyur ro/ byig log par 'gyur ro// lus dri myi zhem par 'gyur ro// lus la 'bras dpa'abrum bu 'dra
38b3(mdo): mo dang / babu dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pas gang bar 'gyur ma// gang dag mdo sde 'dis mya 'dzind pa dang / mdo sde 'di sa bu mo gar 'bri ba dang / mdo sde 'di ste bu klog pa dang / mdo sde 'di sa bu 'chang pa
38b4(mdo): rnams la myi snyan pa'i tshig bden pas myi bden par bsgrags na/ sdig pa'i las de shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o// kun bza po de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa'i dge slong la rgyang
38b5(mdo): ma nas kyang lda bar bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gu sa par bya ba/ de bzhin du mod sde 'di lta bu 'di nad pa'i dge slong dag la'ang gus par bya'o// kun tu bzang pos smos par bya ba'i
38b6(mdo): le'u 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi 'aklung gi bye ma snyed kyis bye ba brgya stong du la khyil ba zhes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par gyur to// / kun tu bzang pos/ 
38b7(mdo): spro bar bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste// nyi shu sa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
38b8(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thul pa chos kyi gdan de las bzhengs te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpayang dag bsdus nas/ chu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa yongs su mus dzam
39a1(mdo): 6/ phyag g.yas pas de dag gi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas/ de'i tshe 'di skad ces bkal sal to// rigs kyi gradas ngas bskal pa mangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya grong
39a2(mdo): chu yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla ni myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad to// yongs su gtad to// rjes su gtad do// gzhag go gdams so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis kyi/ 
39a3(mdo): nas kyang rgya cher rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shi ke/ lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi lag pa g.yas
39a4(mdo): pa nas bzung ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsald to// rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na myed pa yang dag
39a5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad to// yongs su gtad to/ rjes su gtad do/ bzhag go btams so// rigs kyi bya dka khyed kyis blangs pa la gzung do klag go/ 
39a6(mdo): kun chub par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// bshad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la bsgrags par bya'o// rigs bu dag ra la seng sna myed do// 'dzind pa'i sems myed do// 'jigs pa myed pa'i sangs
39a7(mdo): rgyas kyi sa zhes smin pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dbarang byang gi ye shes sbyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu dag pa ni sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po ste/ rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyang nga'i rjes su spobs shig/ 
39a8(mdo): ser sna myed par gyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba sabs la mkhas pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'ongs shing lhags pa'i/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag la yang dag par sgrogs/ 
39b1(mdo): shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dad pa dang / sems can gang dag ma dad pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par gzungs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar byas na/ 
39b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la lan lon par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAg kya thub pas de skad ces bka' stsa yang/ 
39b3(mdo): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas khyab par gyur nga nas zhes cher bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
39b4(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la ba de logs su lus btud rab tu btud nas lus bcu ma ste mgo spyang nas thal mo traH sbyar te/ thams cad kyis skra skang gcig tu
39b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shegs pas ji skad bka' stsalang pa de bzhin 'tshal lo// 
39b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngung ca bder bzhug sa su gsol/ lan gnyis lan gsum du yang thams
39b7(mdo): cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des sgra skad gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das lagazugs las chung ngung ci bder bzhugs su gsolang // bcom ldan 'das ji skad du de
39b8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi ma// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkal yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes gso yang to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
40a1(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog kya thub pas 'jig rten gzhan dag nas byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams
40a2(mdo): cad slar gshegs pasu gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la mi bder gnas par mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la ci bder gnas
40a3(mdo): par mdzod cig ces bya ba gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i mchod rten kyang gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go// 
40a4(mdo): de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang ci bde 'azhugs shig rjes gsungs so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkas stsal nas/ 
40a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ sangs rgyas grangs myed dpag tu myed pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas byon te/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams tu/ 
40a6(mdo): byung dag ma seng ge'i zhi la bzhugs pa de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen ma pa dang thams cad dang / ldan pa'i byang chub
40a7(mdo): sems dpa'i tsho gas de dang / spyod pa'i khyad par can la stsogs pa sa rub nas/ thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu byed pa de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag
40a8(mdo): dang / 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / lha dang myi dang / sna ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thugs su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
40b1(mdo): gangan mdo sde 'di yod par me mar mud kyi do yang nal zhing su khri gtams pa la 'jigs nas kyang rigs kyi phra rnams 'gro bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i rdo kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa
40b2(mdo): chen po'i mdo sde byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsangs rgyas thams
40b3(mdo): cad kyi rigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku
40b4(mdo): gcig tu 'dus pa thabs mkhas pa chen po theg pa gcig tu bsand pa// / don dam pa bsgrub pa bstan pa/ rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po
40b5(mdo): len tre bo di d+hi dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes pas sku sa te tan la sa / @#// / rgya gar skad du// ma snga ga mur phun
40b6(mdo): ka na ma ma mA yan su tra/ bod skad du/ snying rje chen po'i pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
40b7(mdo): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus tshig na/ bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyebar/ gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa/ shing sa la'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las
40b8(mdo): 'dra ba'i dus kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal da pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa do momed kyi rab kyi thun tham sa yongs su mya nganams 'das/ khyod kyis shing sa mthung ki bar tu
41a1(mdo): 6/ bzhin gshegs par zhe sang thogasas pas panal ba'i gzims mal chos shig/ kun dga' bo 'dus byas bu btags pa thams cad legs pa com pa'i shing tu yongs su myang nga las 'das pas
41a2(mdo): ngayongs su mya nganams 'da'o// kun dga' bo ma sangs rgyas kyi byag ni byas/ ngas gnas byed pa'i chos shi ba/ rab tu zhib/ mchog/ mun sa pa/ ba' nga/ mthang bar dka'a'/ 'ongs srung bar dag
41a3(mdo): 5/ bcag kyi nas hA/ ma gtags pa/ tog ge'i khyod yul ma yin pa/ mkhas pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig pa/ bul du byin par 'phagras pa'i bdud ci ni bstan pa/ kun dgal mangs chos kyi mamam
41a4(mdo): bla na byed pa/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ bdud dmade lha 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan gang gos kyang / chos dpas thun par la ga rten du ma bsko dpa/ land gsum du bzlas te
41a5(mdo): rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba ni bskor/ ngas chos kyi rnga chen ni brdungs/ ngas chos kyi hung chen po ni bus/ ngas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po ni bsgred/ ngas chos kyi mar me chen po ni bus/ ngas mun pa
41a6(mdo): chen po ni bsal/ ngas stong gsum gyi snang bar byas/ ngas kyu chen po ni bcas/ ngas stegs chen po mi btsugs/ ngas zam pa chen po ni btags/ ngas pha rol tu 'dod pa mang po ni bton / nga ma thar da pa'i
41a7(mdo): las ni yang dag par bstanang / ngas chos kyi char chen po ni phab/ ngas lha dang kyi rnams ni tshig par byas/ ngas 'dul ba rnams ni btul/ ngas pas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni smag par byas/ ngas myi stegs
41a8(mdo): kyi gnas thams cad ni tshar bcad/ ngas bdud kyi stobs ni bcom/ ngas bdud kyi gnas ni g.yol bar byas/ ngas sing ge 'i sgra ni bsgrahA/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas skyes bu dam pa'i las ni/ 
41b1(mdo): mthar byung / ngas sngon gyi yid ram ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ ngas chos kyi tshul ni byin gyis brlabs/ ras nyan mos chen po rnams las byed du bcug/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chang/ 
41b2(mdo): bar bya ba'i phyir/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la lung ni bstan banid ste/ kun dga' bo mya ngam las 'das pa ma togs par phyis bya ba nga la myed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
41b3(mdo): sa/ lda 'das kyi gzu pa 'das su dathos das/ thug bsngal zhing yi'i gyi di ste/ gyi ngagasa'i 'bya na po'i thas tu nus par gyur nas/ rab tu dus shem sim pag bzhin
41b4(mdo): la dus la 'di na kyis gsas / ngas tu myung bar ma ngan las 'das zhing / bde ba ga / sa par tu gyur par kya / na
41b5(mdo): rab tu mU gyi snang bar gyur/ rab tu myung bar 'jig rten ma / kon ma mchos pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa dang / yongs su / 'dren pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan
41b6(mdo): 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal dab/ kun dga' bo// chog gis mya ngan pa byed/ smre sngags ma 'don cig/ gong gnas pa dang byung ba dang / 'dus byas pa dang / bsags pa ni
41b7(mdo): rab tu 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas/ myi 'jig par ka la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas myed do// kun dga' po ngas thog ma nyid du khyed la/ dka' ba dang / sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / tha dad du
41b8(mdo): 'gyur zhing 'byes par 'gyur/ thar bar 'gyur/ bye bar 'gyur ro// zhes ma bstan tam/ kum dga' bo khyod kyi ngal byams pa'i lus kyi las phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnyis su myed pa dang / 
42a1(mdo): cad byed pa dang / myi 'argyan babyed pas/ bsnyen bkung byas so// 'a ba kAng na dang / rtse dang / na gyi ma tu bas pa dang / thas dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcam
42a2(mdo): bskal ba 'am/ bskald pa las/ lhag par bsnyen bskur byas pa bas/ kang de bzhin gshegs pa la yud tsam cig bsnyen bskur byas pa de/ de bas 'bras bu shi nad tu ches// kun dgal 'o// khyod kyang/ 
42a3(mdo): ma byed cig/ smre sngags ma 'odan cig/ kun dga' po khyod kyis kya de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa ni/ dor che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yod che ba dang / rgya che ba dang / bdud pa dang / 
42a4(mdo): 'dra ba dang / bdud rtsi la 'bab pa dang / bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur ba nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar tu 'gyur ro// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ mchi ma phyung nas
42a5(mdo): smre sngags 'don cing / shide sa la zung gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa sir ge ltar gro g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing sa la zung ga
42a6(mdo): la ba der gshegs nas/ shing sa la zung gi bar du/ sing ge ltar gro g.yas pas mnal to// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shing sa la zung gi 'as tu si dge lhung bro g.yas pas mnal bar gyur pa de liH/ 
42a7(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ shide dang rtsa dang / shing kel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal phan sor bzhi tsam yan cad ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kang du de bzhin gshegs pa
42a8(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa de'i los su gzhol/ rab tu 'argya kyim mngod par 'dud par gyur to// stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ krung ngam/ 'bab rgya'am/ chu myig kam/ mchos 'am// 
42b1(mdo): lteng ka 'am/ khron pa 'am/ dzing ram/ pad ma dkar po 'bab pa ji snyed yo pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pas myi 'bab par gyur da to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig
42b2(mdo): ted gyi khams na/ bya mang po dang / ri dgas mang po snang tshogs ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sgra myi 'byin par 'khod cing myi zal myi rgyu bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen
42b3(mdo): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma/ nyi ma dang thA ba'i 'od dam/ skam pa'i gzugs sam/ nor bu 'am/ me 'am/ min bu me khyed kyi 'od ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi thathus kyi mngon kyi
42b4(mdo): snang ste/ lam med mA yin/ stan ner ma yin/ lha reng ma na par gyur da to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi/ mas na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me ji snyed yod pa de
42b5(mdo): dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhi bar gyur da// myi 'bar bar gyur pa/ myi tsha bar 'gyur// mya tshig par gyur/ yongs su myi gdung bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen
42b6(mdo): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i ma de dag thams cad kyang nye ba bzhi zhing bsol b.rang gyur to// de nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig
42b7(mdo): de dang yud tsam de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba thob par gyur to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur
42b8(mdo): sa pa gcig gnang sems byed/ rnam par 'jo babyed/ rnam par mam ma pa kyang gnong sa byed pabyed par 'gyur to// gzhin rjem 'a ga rkyen pa'i sems can thams cad kyang bkres pa dang / 
43a1(mdo): skom pa myed pa rang gyur du to// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang / yud tsam de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba dang / lus dang sems tshim pa dang / sdug bsngal rgyun chad pa dang / bde bar/ 
43a2(mdo): yid bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur to// de bzhin ga shegs pa sing ge ltar khro g.yas pas mnas ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong cher po 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ro'i rgyal po ri ra par dang // 'khor
43a3(mdo): yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dang / btang bzung dang btang bzung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad ldan dang / gangs ri ji snyed yod pa dang / gzhan yang rinag po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa chen po dang / 
43a4(mdo): rgya mtsho'i chen po 'khor yug gi 'obs kyi mthal gdugs pa rnam drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrug sa/ sdig rab tu ldegs pang gyur da to// thams cad dang ldan pa
43a5(mdo): rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang de'i tshe myi ldang bar gyur to// de'itshe skad cig de dang / yud tsam de na sems can thams cad kyang las byed pa rnams btang bar gyur da te/ gnyid myed chod pa myed/ 
43a6(mdo): sgrib pa myed/ phom pa myed cing / cang myi 'tsher bar 'gyur te/ sgra chung / ca co chung zhing yid myi g.yeng bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das seng ge ltar gro g.yas pas yan la ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong
43a7(mdo): chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ji dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
43a8(mdo): ji snyed 'khor ba de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gnas rnams yog mog yor gyur te/ 'od byed/ gzis byin byed par gyurang bar sheso de bzhin gshegs ka'i seng ge ltar gro g.yas/ 
43b1(mdo): myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang // 
43b2(mdo): rnas pa thA/ ga rgyu tad kyi / dang / b+ha na rkyen dang / dang/ ma tshan dang / ma ma rji pa
43b3(mdo): mis da myong baji ga sa da nga ra na / pa dang / mas kyi dga' pa gyur to// ngas rgyas kyi thus dadas thams cad lam
43b4(mdo): bar skyo zhing yo byung bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ tsang ba dang tshangs pa chen po gang dag zild kyis gnond cing / zo lad kyis kyi don pa brgya phrag bcu la la dbang sgyur ba
43b5(mdo): 'di snyam du sems shing / bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag/ byas/ bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag sprul da/ bdag cagagis 'jig rten byas/ bdag cag gis 'jig rten spru lang to// 
43b6(mdo): snyam du de de ltar shes pa'i tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa de dag kyang rang rang gi stan la/ mngon par myi dga' bar gyur to// 
43b7(mdo): rang rang gi gnas thams cad dang ldan pa'i yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ yog yog por gyur bar shes so// de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthus rang rang gi gnas rnams mog
43b8(mdo): mogo khong gyu nga bar shes te/ rang rang ki gnas rnams la myi dka' bar gyu da to// 'jig rten skyong pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas rnams la myi dgal bar gyur ro// 
43b9(mdo): denas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de 'di snyim du/ gang gis bdag rang gi gnas la myi dgal bar gyurd pa de su'i sa ltas yin snyam sems so// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po li'ajig rten
44a1(mdo): tshangs pa des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po yi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan pa thams cad la bsdus so// des stong gsum gyi stong cheran po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la bsdus nas 'di snyam du ga
44a2(mdo): thastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byed pa'o// dbang phyug bdag po/ dbang sbyang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de de mod mya ngan las sa/ 
44a3(mdo): par gyur te/ gang gis bdag rang gi sun la 'dug par gyi dka' ba dang / gang gis cho 'phrul bsas kyis kyi khyab pa/ mang du byung ba/ 'di lta bu dag snang bar gyu rang pa 'don de yongs su mya ngan las 'das tshal
44a4(mdo): snga ltas yin/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin no snyam du sems ste/ de myi dka' zhing rung zhes byed/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ tshangs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskord cing mdun du ba dang de/ 
44a5(mdo): myur ba myur bang rings par bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song / de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po na tshangs pa lhag ma lus paragyu rad pa dang / ma 'dus pa dang / tshangs pa de las gzhan pa
44a6(mdo): snyed yod pa de dag 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par 'dud par gyu dang / 'phags pa'i chos la gnas par gyur da to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ 
44a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ci ltar grub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsalan
44a8(mdo): tu gso yang // de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// tshangs pa khyod pa ni tshangs pa/ tshangs pa chen po'i zild kyis gnond cing
44b1(mdo): zil gyis kyi gnod pa/ kun shes pa dang ldan pa/ brgya zag bcu la dbang sgru pa yin te/ bdag gis sems can nams byas/ bdag gis sems can rnams sA yang/ bdag gis 'jig rten byas
44b2(mdo): shing de na banan/ ga nga da/ shegs pa ma dang/ da/ 
44b3(mdo): sras bya sa/ sus pa ya / de nas tshangs patshan bcad kyi smra bar gyud to// rangs pachen po de cang gyi smra bar mya rang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa kang gi tshe/ 
44b4(mdo): bskal pas bsregs pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum go / slong chen gyi 'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di 'bad/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu 'bang/ kun tu rab tu mched cing / 'bang de me lce gcig tu gyur pa tham
44b5(mdo): rgyas de dang / che de byung ba de tshangs pa khyod nyid kyis byas sam/ khyod kyis sprul da tam/ gso med pa/ bcom ldan la das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gangs
44b6(mdo): chen po 'di ni chu'i phung po la rten/ chu yang chu la rten/ rlung yang nam mkha' la rtend te/ 'bang du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad stong yod cing gyi 'jig pa de la ci snyam du sems 'di khyod kyis byas shir
44b7(mdo): khyod kyis sprul da tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so// bka' stsald pa tshangs pa gang nyi ma dang za ba'i gzhal myed khang na/ lha'i bu dka lham ma
44b8(mdo): ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin zhing gzhal byed khang rnams stong par 'khod pa'i dus de dang / tshe de byang ba de la ci snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byis shing / khyod kyis spru khad pa dang / khyod
45a1(mdo): kyis kyid kyis rnams pa yinanapa/ gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' bral dang / gang thos ka dang / dbyungag dang / bskyon dang / dkun dang / dkyu pa dang / dpying kyi drug/ 
45a2(mdo): tshogs de dag sa/ khyod ci snyam tu se mas/ de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis skang zhing khyod kyis sprusad pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das ya lags so// 
45a3(mdo): bka' stsal dpa/ tshangs pa kang chu 'am/ the long gi dkyil 'khor ram/ 'bru lar dang / mar gyi snod dam/ nor bu dang / shel rnams kyi nang ngam/ de las gzhan pa'i sdod dag pa rnams la/ gzugs
45a4(mdo): brtan rnam pa sna tshogs sdang ba 'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga'ar ba dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / kazhal myed khang sda pa 'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong dam
45a5(mdo): sdang ba 'am/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang / dang / bong bu dang / lug dang / ri dgas dag dang / bya rnams sA/ teng ba 'am/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs snang
45a6(mdo): ba 'am/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu sdang ba dang / sa dang / mi dang rlung sdang ba 'am/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig ce/ 
45a7(mdo): sbyor ba dang / de las gzhan pa'i sems can myi dang / phyi ma yin pa snang ba de dag/ tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byi nad kyis brlabs pa yin nam/ 
45a8(mdo): ka mo lang pa/ pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa g.yang sa dang / ri dang / ri'i 'bab rgya dang / dzi rnams na dud dang / ra bo che dang / rdza ra dang / mu ga
45b1(mdo): ri dgas dang / bya dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra'i brag cha dang / gang de dang mthun pa'i sgra brtan byung pa de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis spru lad pa dang / khyod kyis
45b2(mdo): byin kyis rlobs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsa lad pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi rmyi lam na/ gzugs sna tshogs mthong pa dang / sgra sA
45b3(mdo): tshogs zos pa dang / dri sna tshogs sdom pa dang / ro sna tshogs myong ba dang / reg bya sna tshogs reg pa dang / chos sna tshogs shes pa drang / dka' ba dang / phe ba sna tshogs myong ba dang / mchi ma
45b4(mdo): byung ba dang / du pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba mthong ba dang / myong ba 'am/ shes pa de dag/ tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis sprul pa dang
45b5(mdo): khyod kyis byin gyis blarla bas pa yin nam/ gsos dpa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal da pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang / myi dka' ba
45b6(mdo): dang / mya den dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / zang pa dang / rtsa ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byind kyis rlabs pa yin dam/ 
45b7(mdo): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal ba/ tshangs pa gang rigs bzhi'i 'jigs rten gyi mdzes pa 'am/ myi stug pa 'am/ long spyod che ba 'am/ long spyod chung ba
45b8(mdo): ya/ dbul pa 'am / bgasod rnams che ba 'am/ tshul khrims pa'ang ba 'am/ rgyal khrims 'a la ba 'am/ shes rab babang ba 'am/ shes rab 'am mapa dngas kyang / dpa bzod kyis rgya
46a1(mdo): shing / khyod kyis sprulang pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis rlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'dzi/ 
46a2(mdo): pa 'am/ sma pa 'am/ gnod pa 'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba 'am/ rnam par mtho mtsham pa 'di lta ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / chung dmar dang / dug dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / dgra dang / myi dang / 
46a3(mdo): myi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gzhan gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa/ sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa 'khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis spru lang pa dang / khyod kyang byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam
46a4(mdo): ka so lad pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsa/ lad pa/ tshangs pa sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs rlung dang / mkhrigs pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / 
46a5(mdo): dus dang / khams myi mthun pa las gyurd pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa dang / snong gi las kyi// sgrib pa las gyur da pa 'di lta ste/ myig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lde dang / 
46a6(mdo): sus na pa dang / sems can rnams kyi yid la gtung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs de dag khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs tha yon nam/ gsol pa
46a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal da pa/ tshangs pa gang mu ke dang / chu dang 'brog dang / sprul dang / chom kun dang / dkon pa dang / mchon sa dang / nad dang / bur gyi bskal pa de dag
46a8(mdo): sa pa cad kyis byas shing / khyod kyis sprus pa dang / khyad kyis byin kyis 'arnams pa yinanas/ gzis malda dpa san du/ bka' sus dan/ ngas pag pa sems padan
46b1(mdo): kyi 'bra la ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par sna tshogs pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / grogs dang / nye du dang / sdig ki gnyen 'tshams dang / bu po dang / chung ma dang / bu mo dag dang / bral ba'i sdug bsngal
46b2(mdo): de dag khyod kyis byas zhing / khyod kyis srul pa dang / khyod kyis byin kyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal ba/ gang sems can rnams kyi sdug
46b3(mdo): bsngal sna tshogs yang ba'i las la sbyor pa/ sma dang / phabs dang / rgya skags dang / 'khor lo 'tshong ba 'am/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'am/ 'phrog dgon par 'jug pa'am/ phyogs sna tshogs su skyes
46b4(mdo): 'debs pa 'am/ zhing gi las rgya cher byed pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i bya ba sna tshogs de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyod kyis bya sa shing / khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis
46b5(mdo): brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnam sa kyi dge ba dang / myi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag
46b6(mdo): par lend pa/ sems can dmyal dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshis rje'i 'jig rten dang / lpa dang / myi'i rgya las byung ba rnams dang / gang sems can rnams kyi lus dang / ngag dang
46b7(mdo): yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / legs par spyad pa rnams sam/ gang 'jig rten na myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sems can rnams la ni myi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / gnod pa dang / 
46b8(mdo): ngas song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar gyur nga ba 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par lend pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'aza ma dang / ngag rtsub mo dang / 
47a1(mdo): tshig mkhyag pa dang / brda pa sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba de rnams kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gso lang/ 
47a2(mdo): pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal da pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnod byed kyi sdug bsngal 'di lta ste/ mgo' 'bacad pa 'am/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang rna ba dang
47a3(mdo): sna bcad pa 'am/ yan lag dang / nyon lag thams cad bcad pa 'am/ med bsregs pa dang / 'bru mar gyis gto da pa dang / srog dang bral ba dang / ral gri dang mdung dang / mtshon che gnyis pA
47a4(mdo): btab pa dang / bsad pa dang / 'tshong ba dang / ko rang gzhu gas pa dang / 'thab pa dang / bcod pa dang / 'khyed pa de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyed kyis byas shing / khyod kyis byin kyis brlabs
47a5(mdo): pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsald pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa yi gzhis ma la yog pa
47a6(mdo): spyod pa dang / sring mo la log par spyod pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la log par spyod pa dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad la lhag par spyod pa de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / 
47a7(mdo): khyod kyis yu lang pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brdabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa kang sems can rnams kyi gnod par byed pa/ 
47a8(mdo): sna tshogs byed dang / ro langs dang / rigs sngags dang / sngags dang / sman dang / 'byung ba dang / gnod 'bebs dang / gang de las gzham pa cug spyor ba dang / gang sems can rnams la
47b1(mdo): gnod par gyur nga ba dang / srog dang bral bar 'gyurarang pa dang / srog 'tshod par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis srul ba dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin na/ 
47b2(mdo): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' bstsal pa/ yang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spang du myi rung ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang / rgas pa dben pa dang
47b3(mdo): lachi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde'i ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / myi rtag pa'i chos nyid dang / zad pa'i chos nyid/ 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang / mdza' ba dang / dkal
47b4(mdo): pa thams cad dang / ba dad du gyurd pa dang / byed par gyur ba dang / dbral bar 'gyur ba dang / byer gyur pa de dag kyang / tshangs pa dad kyis byas shong / khyod kyis srul pa dang / khyod kyis
47b5(mdo): byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal ba/ tshangs pa sems can rnams kyi'adod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sgrib pa dang / 
47b6(mdo): cod pa dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas bkris pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang / de las gzhan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa gang gis/ sems can rnams chags par gyur pa dang / 
47b7(mdo): sdang bar 'gyur ba dang / mongs par 'gyur ba dang / las mngon par 'du bya ba rnams pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyod kying byas shing / khyod kyis sru lad pa dang / khyod kyis byin
47b8(mdo): kyis brlabs pa yin napa/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsa ldad pa/ tshangs pa 'di gang 'di sems can dmyal ba dang / hud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshis rje'i 'jig rten dang / 
48a1(mdo): hA/ ngam 'gro rnam pa gsum po gang sems can rnams gnod byed napas pasna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyis su lad pa dang / khyod kyis/ 
48a2(mdo): byin gyis brlabs pa la yon nas// gso la pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal dpa/ tshangs pag pa 'di dag 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / ya nga/ shing shes pa dang
48a3(mdo): bras dang / nags tshal chun gnas pa dang / zabs gnas pa dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs sam/ dang ba dang / kha ba dang / yan tshab dang/ 
48a4(mdo): skur ba dang / tsha ba dang / bskal ba'i ro'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogasu yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba mngon par grub pa/ gang sems can rnams la phan pa dang / gnod par 'gyur ba de la ji snyam du
48a5(mdo): sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing / khyod kyi// sa yul pa ya dang / khyod kyis byin brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bkal ma
48a6(mdo): stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'gro ba lnga po dag na/ yongs su 'khor bar skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / mthon po dang / 'byu pha ba dang / 'jig pa 'di dag dang / tshangs pa gang sems can
48a7(mdo): ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang / med pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pas kun tu byug cing 'khob ba 'di dag gi thon gyi mthal gyi mthong ba dang / tshangs pa ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba'i las rgya mya chang ba/ gang na lnga dang bam
48a8(mdo): pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten di dang / dge slong dang / bras ze dang mas na'i skye chags 'jugs pas rba/ rgya gu 'dzings las su/ 'angab dang / 'gro bar gyu da pa 'dzin/ 
48b1(mdo): cen 'di nas/ 'jig rten pha rol dang / 'jig rten pa ro med nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor bar/ 'khor ba las 'byung ba kyi shes pa/ de dag pa ji snyam pa sems/ tshangs pa dengs
48b2(mdo): khyod kyis byas shing / khyed kyis srul da pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs par yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde'i bar gshegs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa
48b3(mdo): yon tshangs pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltang ngas sems can 'di dag byas/ ngas yul da/ ngas byin gyis rlabs/ ngas 'jig rten byas/ ngas stsa lang / ngas byin gyis rlabs snyam sems/ gsol dpa bcom
48b4(mdo): ldan 'das/ bdag ni ma 'tshal pa/ rtag tu lta bar gyur/ pa ma yangs pas/ phyi nang ci ldog tu gyur pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ gsungs
48b5(mdo): ba'i chos 'dul ba dag ma thos pas/ sems can rnams dag gis bgyis/ bdag gis spel da/ 'jig rten bdag gise ma bgyis/ 'jig rten bdag gis sru lad ces bgyi ba sdig
48b6(mdo): ba can gyi lta bar gyur pa 'di lta bur gyurd to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid bdag zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di sus bgyis/ 'jig rten 'di sus sprus/ 
48b7(mdo): sems can rnams sus bgyis/ sras sprul pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i mthu las/ sus byin gyis brlabs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa de dag la 'di skad
48b8(mdo): ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa 'jig rten gyi las kyis byas/ las kyis sku lad to/ sems can rnams ni las kyis byas/ las kyi rgyu las byung ba/ las kyis rab tu phye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
49a1(mdo): tangs pa ma rig pa'i rkyend kyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyend kyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyend kyis mying dang gzugs/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyend kyis skye mched drug/ 
49a2(mdo): skye mched drug gi rkye nad kyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyend kyis sred pa/ med pa'i rkyend kyis lend pa/ len pa'i rkyend kyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyend kyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyend kyis
49a3(mdo): rga shi dang / mya ngang dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde'i ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig byung bar 'gyur shing / 
49a4(mdo): tshangs pa ma rig pa 'gags pa nas/ sdug bsngal gyi phyeng po 'ba' zhig 'gags pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ tshangs pa las dang / chos rna kun tu sbyong ba rnams yod na/ sems can rnams 'byung bar snang
49a5(mdo): pa dang / las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba dang bral bas// 'byung ba myed par snang ba ma rtogs par/ 'di la byed pa pol// ma/ byed tu 'jug pa 'am/ nye bar 'jog pa gang yang myed
49a6(mdo): yang myed do// tshangs pa de ltar 'jig rten 'di las zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa dang / sdug bsngal zad pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / nges par 'byung ba
49a7(mdo): dang / rnam par zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngam las 'das pa zhes bya'o// tshangs pa de las gang yin pa de zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa gang yon pa de dang bral ba dang / sug bsngal gang yin pa de ma
49a8(mdo): bangabagi pa dang / rdus pa ma rtogs par yangs su mya ngam pas 'das pa zhes bya ba coM na mang / sadas rgyas rnams kyis bu dang / sangs rgyas rnam pa khyod kyis pa byas kyis chom yod des
49b1(mdo): bu dag byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba myed na// chos de lta bu rab tu ston pa myi 'byung gi/ tshangs pa gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan
49b2(mdo): 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ zhi bang bya ba'i phyir khong du chud par dka' ba/ zab pa/ zab par sdang ba// chos rnam pa de lta bu dag yang dag par stond par gyur to// de thos pas sems
49b3(mdo): can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba las yongs su rgol bar 'gyur ro// sems can rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'jug pa ma
49b4(mdo): chos can rnams ni khrug pa'i ba dag las yongs su rmos par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa de lta bas na 'di lta ste/ ludz+ra h+ye/ da thams cad ni myig yod lta bu/ myi rtag pa/ g.yo / 
49b5(mdo): myi brtan pa/ zer zug ma yin pa/ zad pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes tshangs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis de bstan cing yang dag par bshad de/ rnam par phye zhing
49b6(mdo): gsal par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin kyis brdabs so// bsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyis dam pa'i chos nub pa na
49b7(mdo): yang 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad myig yor lta bu'o zhes bya ba de nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'du byed thams cad myig yor lta bur
49b8(mdo): ma gzigs su zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skad cig yud tsam yA pa 'dra byed thams cad myi lam dang / myig yod dang / brag cha lta bur myi ston pa zhig na/ tshangs pa gang gi phyir
50a1(mdo): da shesas 'du byed pas mas pa dang / rgyan sa dang / ba dang / gapa dang / ba dang / ltu namam ma sa pa ba
50a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la byed rnam par dkyil pa dang / smyin yang dang / zag mas za ston to/ de la mkhas pas de'i mtshan ma mthong ba dang yod de/ de macan pa mthong nas rgyur rang ca
50a3(mdo): de dang / dmyigs pa'i mtshan ma das/ 'du byed thams cad kyi rtag par khong du chung cing / g.yo ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes rnam khar 'byed de// 'du byed thams dacang ni 'jig cing 'gyur // 
50a4(mdo): dus dang / tshigs dang / rgyam tshigs kyis kyang 'jog go// skad cig dang / khang cig dang / brod mam dang / cad tsam dang / zhag dang / nyis dang / za ba dang / za ba byed dang / lo dang / 
50a5(mdo): lo brgya dang / skal ba dang / bskal pa brgya dag kyanga'ajig par 'gyur ro// me'i phung po chen po/ yang 'bar nas shi bar 'gyur ro// chu'i phung po chen po yang bab nas
50a6(mdo): myi 'bab bo// rlung gi phung po chen po yang sangs nas khyi ldang ngo// sa'i phung po chen po yang byung nas myed par 'gyur ro// ro'i phung po chen po khor yug dang 'khokhror yug chen po dang / lhun po
50a7(mdo): lhun po chen po dang / de las gzhan pa'i ri nag po dag kyang byung nas myed par 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang / bcas pa 'di dag byung nas/ lham myer ma yin
50a8(mdo): lhar cher ma yin/ lhang rer ma yin zhing slar ltung ngo // lha yul ba'i lha'i gzhal myed khang bzang po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro// grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal 'di dag dang / shing ljon
50b1(mdo): pa dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dang / kun dag la nyams 'di dag kyang byung nas/ 'gags par 'gyur ro// lha dang / myi 'di rnams kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur
50b2(mdo): skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag kyang mtshan ma de mthong nas/ kye ma mo/ 'du byed 'di thams cad myi rtag go / 'jig go// 'acu byed 'di thams cad myed par 'gro'o// 'gyur ro// 'du byed 'di thams cad
50b3(mdo): zad par 'gyur ro// snyam nas skyo bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag rgyu'i de dang / rkyen des/ khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu 'byung ngo // de dag dad pas khyim nas khyim myed par yang dag pa
50b4(mdo): rab tu byung nas kyang / 'du byed thams cad myig yor lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / brag cha lta bur rig ste/ mtshan ma de dang // dmyigs pa dang / rkyen das/ byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// 
50b5(mdo): rgya'i nA r+ya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / nyi mya'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs skur ba de dag mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dams pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i
50b6(mdo): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bdan mo'am/ bdag gis zos btags pas/ 'du byed thams cad ma lam dang / myig yod dang / zag mas bung tegs nas dad pas khyim nas khyis myed par rab tu byung / 
50b7(mdo): rgyan dam sums pa'i sems pa dang / sadang cig kyi 'ang ba'i 'bras pa dang / byar gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab par dang / dam bcom pa nyid mdon sum du byed pa dang / gang bag byang chub sems dpa'
50b8(mdo): theg pa la bzod pa dang tho thob pa dang / bzod pa gnyis pa dang / gang sum bathob pa dang / thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tho ba par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu mkhas padag med do// sangs rgyas
51a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyang ngamasas 'das pa rnams kyis chos bstanang pa 'di nyid 'jig ter du 'byung ste// de thos pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rab sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / 
51a2(mdo): theg pa chen po bla na myed pa gnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang / theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ tshangs pa 'di ltar 'di yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis rlangs
51a3(mdo): su rig par bya ste/ tshangs pa gang gis skyes bu mkhas pa dag gis 'du byed dag ni sdug bsngal ba dang / gso la/ kyai brtan pa/ zang pa dang / 'gyur ba la chos can te/ rmyi lam dang / myig yong dang
51a4(mdo): brag cha lta bu'o// zhes bya ba'i ni mi de mthong nas yang dag par skyo bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnam des kyi yul dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs so// 
51a5(mdo): sngon yad cer sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i sems can sngon yod/ sa su sbyin par bya ba dag gis chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di thos nas 'a du byed 'di dag thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed rnams ni 'jig
51a6(mdo): ba ste/ 'du byed/ thams cad ni mi sam dang / zag che la du migs/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mos par 'byung / mngon par dad par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
51a7(mdo): 'das rnams kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bgyur ba/ 'am/ khyim par gyu nga pas/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yongs su bzung bar gyur pa de dag kyang / rgyu de dang / kye nad nges 'di ltar 'du byed rnams kyi
51a8(mdo): rtag pa dang / 'du byed rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / 'du byed nams 'jig pa dang / 'du byed rnams mi lam dang / myig/ yong dang / zag ma lta bu'o// zhes 'du byed rnams de lta bu'i tshul du rtogs par
51b1(mdo): 'byung te/ rgyu dang / kye du des dang pas khyim nas khyim myed pa rab tu byung ngas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamapa 'jig rten gsum byung yang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs nyid dang
51b2(mdo): ngas rgyas sa rin 'a'is pa bskyed pa'i rkyedan kyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa rnam grangs des kyang / 'di sa pa 'dod sangs rgyal gyi byid gyis rlabs dang / 'di sangs rgyas kyi yum yid bar
51b3(mdo): rig par bya'o// tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te/ tshangs pa 'di ni nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa s+yang ba na/ 
51b4(mdo): skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad myed grangs myed pa rnams kyi hung du/ dge ba'i phra ba'i tshad myed grangs myed pa bskyed de/ tshul khrims dang
51b5(mdo): dka' thub dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / de las gzhan ba'i dka' ba spyad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis ji ltar da ge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel por 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongs
51b6(mdo): su dag par 'gyur ba dang / dus dang / tshod dang / snod ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba nye bar gzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ngo // yongs su sbyangs so// ngas sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / 
51b7(mdo): don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par bsdus te/ de dag nga'i smon lam nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes nas ngas chos bston pa 'ang shes
51b8(mdo): so// nga'i chos bsan pas/ 'dul bar yang 'gyur te/ brgya byin rnams kyis ma yin/ tshangs pa rnams kyi ma yin/ 'jig rten sbyong ba rnams kyi ma yin no// tshangs pa rnams grangs 'dis kyang / de 'di skar
52a1(mdo): na rnams kyi na/ ngas rnasan/ 'dig rten stong ba rnams kyis yin/ na bu steg kyang @#
52a2(mdo): dang / gun tu rgyu rnams kyi ma yin pa b.rig par bya'o// de nas myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ 'bum zag bcu'i bdag po tshangs pa de dang de las gzhan pa'i tshangs pa rnams skyo zhing yid phyung bar gyur te/ tshig
52a3(mdo): 'di skad ces/ ji tsam tu sangs rgyas banom ldan 'das rnapas chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa ngo mtshang to// ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mang du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to zhes smras so//
