257a7(mdo): rnams kyis ni/ gyi 'thogs pa brjod pa dang / mnyan pa dang sas pa la don mchis pa rnams kyis ni/ smon lam 'arjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngod gsum tu rjes su rtogs par bgyid pa'i sa tu rgyud 'ams
257a8(mdo): kharnams kyis ni rgya mtsho yi dri me byed pa 'arjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa pa 'i ye shes lhags dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni/ sangs rgyas shin tu rnam khas sangs rgya sa pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
257b1(mdo): dgongs pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mtha' ma mchis pa dang / zug pa mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan pa 'tshal bar gyur da cag/ byang chub sems dpal gang dag g.yo ma mchis pa sgyu ma mchis pa/ drang ba/ drang ba'i rang bzhin
257b2(mdo): can// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dpag tu ya mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig brjod pas kyang chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzungs
257b3(mdo): bdun khri lnga stong po yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyur da cig// des byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po 'tshal bar gyur da cig// smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyis myi khyab pas mngon par 'phags par gyur da cig/ 
257b4(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / byang chub kyi yon tan dam pas brgyan par gyur da cig// 'di lta ste lus mtshan dang dpel byad rnams kyis brgyad par gyur da cig/ ngag legs par sma bas sems
257b5(mdo): can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mgu bar bgyi sa pas brgyan par gyur da cig/ ting nge 'dzi dang tshig sa mchis pa'i srad du thos pas brgyad pa dang / gzungs bskyed pa ma mchis pa'i sad du ga dran pas
257b6(mdo): brgyan pa dang / 'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i skad du/ yid kyis brgyan cing / mya ngan las 'das pas brgyan pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i slad du/ bsam pa brgyan pa dang / dam bcas pa nyams su lon pa'i srad du sbyor bas
257b7(mdo): brgyan pa dang / sa nas sa pa'i phags pa'i slad tu/ lhag pa'i bsam pas brgyad pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sad bu/ sbyin pas brgyan pa dang / legs par thos pa khong du chud pa dri ma mchis pa'i srad du/ 
257b8(mdo): tshul khrims kyis bgyur ba dang / sems pa thams cad sa zhe 'gras pa'i mams sa pa mchis pa'i srad du bzod pas brgyan pa dang / tshogs pams pa nye bar bsngags pa'i slad su brtson 'grus kyis brgyad pa dang / rnams
258a1(mdo): 'dun thamams cad dang mjam par shes pas rnam par 'che ba'i srad tu/ bsam gtan gyis brgyand pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongs su 'tshal ba mi srad tu shes rab kyis brgyad par gyur na cig/ sems can
258a2(mdo): thams cad yang dag par spyon pa'i rjes su mchim pa'i sras cu/ byams pas btud pa dang / sems cad thams cad mangs su myi gtong ba la yang tu gnas pa'i srad bya/ snying des 'artsad pa dang / chos thams cad la be com ma mchim pa
258a3(mdo): gyurd pa'i skad du/ dga' bas brgyan pa dang / mtho na dman gnyis dang bral ba'i slad du btang snyoms kyis brgyan pa dang / mngon par zhes pa thams cad kyis rnam par brtse ba'i slad du mngon par shes pas brgyan pa dang / longs spyospyod
258a4(mdo): myi bas pa'i rin po che'i lag pa thob pa'i slad du/ bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal ba 'i slad du/ ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis chos
258a5(mdo): togs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i srad bya/ thos brgyan pa dang / shes rab kyi myig gi sdang ba thob pa'i srad du/ snang bas brgyan pa'i gyur da cig/ don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang
258a6(mdo): dag par rig pa thob pa'i skad du/ so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan par gyur da cig/ bdud dngakhas kyi rgol bas thams cad kyi non pa'i srad du/ mye 'jigs pas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tamadzes su thob pa 'i
258a7(mdo): prad s+ya/ yon tan gyis brgya nang ba dang / rtag tu rgyan gyi lawan yang thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spoms pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i srad du/ chos kyis brgya dang par gyur dacig// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdang bar gyur
258a8(mdo): ba'i mang sa/ spa ba kyarang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad tu/ 'dakyis brgyad pa dang / byed pa srang smin pa'i sad tu/ kun tu 'dzad pa'i tshe 'thul gyis brgyad pa dang / yang dag pa 'is
258b1(mdo): bzhin du/ rjes su stond pa tshol ba'i slad du/ rjes su ston pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgya nad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i slad du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgya na pa dang / de mazhin gshegs
258b2(mdo): paligs pa pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis brgyad pa dang / gzhams rag pa las pa'i ye shes thob pa'i slad du/ chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyan pa dang / ji skad smras
258b3(mdo): pa de bzhin dub kyi de cing thams cad kyis myi choms pa'i slad du/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid las brgyan par gyur da cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can dpag tu ma yAchis
258b4(mdo): grangs pa mchis pa dag la yang dag par bdag gis tshig gcig brjod pas/ dge ba rnam par sbyor pa yang dag par bstsags pa chen pos yang dag par tshim par gyur da cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
258b5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po de dag/ gas chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa ye shes thob par gyur da cig/ chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur da cig/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
258b6(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang gyur da cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dkan nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ sran myed pa'i theg pa
258b7(mdo): chen po'i sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur da pa de dag kyang smon las kyi dbang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing skye bar
258b8(mdo): gyur // sems can myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / 'grogs pa chub pa sdig pa 'tshal ba/ kha khro dang mu rgod kyi rgyud can/ blo ldog pa/ kun 'dzind pa'i rgyud can de dag la yang bdag gis sems dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong dge ston
259a1(mdo): par gyur da cig/ sems can le lo can gyi bar dag la yang bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag cher stond par gyur da cig/ de na sems can gang dag bla na myed pa'i theg pa chen po par gyur pa pa de dag
259a2(mdo): la yang bdag gis pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi chos rnams rgya chen por stond par 'gyur zhing // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar tu rgya cher stond par gyur da cig
259a3(mdo): yang de na sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur da pa 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun cing bstan bcos la mngon par dka' bar gyur da pa de dag kyang / bdag gis gsum la skyabs
259a4(mdo): su mchi ba la 'god par 'gyur zhing / srad kyis pha rol tu phyinang pa drug po dag la yang spyod par gyur da cig/ rnam par mtshe la dga' ba rnams ni srog gcod pa spong ba la 'god par gyur da cig/ 'dod pa myi
259a5(mdo): bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams ni ma byin par lend pa spong ba la 'god par gyur da cig/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags pa na/ mas ni/ 'dod chags rnams la log par g.yem pa spong ba la 'god
259a6(mdo): gyur da cig/ phan tshun rdzun tu smra ba rnams ni rdzun du sma pa spong pa la 'god par gyu dad cig/ myos par 'gyur pa la mo ngan par dgal ba rnams ni/ char dang bcos pa'i chang myos pa'i gyur ba bag myed pa song ba' la 'god par
259a7(mdo): gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag no nges pa lnga po thams cad bgyid par gyur da pa de dag ni nongs pa lnga po spong zhing dge snyen gyi sdom pa la 'god par gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par myi dka'
259a8(mdo): pa de dag ni bdag gis nyin gcig tsam yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims la rab tu 'god par gyur da cig// sems can gang dag dge ba'i sra ba chu yul mngon par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni bdag gis
259b1(mdo): legs par gsungs pa'i chom 'dul pas nye bar sbyang bar bgyi zhing / rab tu 'byung ba'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i tshangs par spyod pa la 'god par gyur da cig/ sems cad ka ba dag dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su tsha
259b2(mdo): bar 'tshal ba de dag ni bdag gis dge ba'i chos rnams la nye bar bsgrubs nas/ tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la rab tu 'god par gyur da cig/ sems can mtshams mchis pa bgyid pa dang / kun 'dzind pa'i rgyud
259b3(mdo): can gyi bar de lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis don dang / tshig dang yi ge rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gi cho 'phrul rnams kyis chos stond par gyur da cig/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dag gi myi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal
259b4(mdo): ba dang / bdag ma mchis pa dang / stong par ston par 'gyur zhing / bde bar dang / dge ba dang / zhi ba dang / shes pa dang / 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god par gyur da cig
259b5(mdo): de ltar bdag 'khor bzhi po/ dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la ston par gyur da cig/ gang dag spyod 'tshal par gyur da pa de dag la bdag gis chos kyi ya nyad pas
259b6(mdo): bstan bcos rab tu ston par gyur da cig/ gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par myi dga' ba de dag la bdag gis zhal te bgyid pa'i las stond par gyur da cig/ kha ton la mngon par dkal ba rnams la ni
259b7(mdo): stong pa nyid kyi bsam gtan gyi cha gcig gis rnam par grol 'a'i lam ston par gyur da cig/ sems can de la de'i don gi sred du/ yang bdag dpag tshad 'bum phrag mang po dag tu sug pas mchi bar gyur cin// dom
259b8(mdo): tshog dang / yi kai dang / thabs dang / cho 'bral rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gis skyo ba ma mchis shing / spro bar bgying bar gyur da la dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar 'god par gyur da cig/ ting nge 'dzi rad kyi stobs kyis
260a1(mdo): bdag gi tshe 'i lda byed ji tsam pa'i lA la 'dong bar gyur da cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes kyi ched/ rang gi sku gdung bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du gcod par 'gyur zhing / 
260a2(mdo): sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du/ bdag ni sred kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur da cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo stob du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur da cag/ 
260a3(mdo): yang lo lnga brgyar ni/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brtan gnas par gyurd cag// sems cad gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams la ni rin po che rnams dang / rol mo'i sna dag gi bar gyis
260a4(mdo): mchod pa bgyid par spro ba skyed par 'gyur ba dang / za na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang / phyag gcig tsam dang / bskor ba gan ge tsam dang / thal mo sbyar ba gcig tsam dang / me tog gcig tsam gyi rgyas
260a5(mdo): mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji ste ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag gis slar myi ldog par gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag pa dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan
260a6(mdo): pa ya za na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam 'dzind par 'gyur ram/ ji skad stand pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas gnas sam/ tshi ge bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam go bar dag kun chub par bgyid dam/ glog gam gzhan
260a7(mdo): dag la yang ston par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis thos nas sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur zhi / tha ma dam pa'i chos smra ba sa me tog gcig tsam dang / phyag gcig tsam gos mchod par bgying bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad
260a8(mdo): kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag gis slar myi ldog par gyur da cig/ ji tsam na dam pa'i chos nub ste/ chos kyi sgron ma ni gum/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni skyel bar gyur nga pa na/ bdag skyes pa'i sku
260b1(mdo): gdung de dag kyang gser gi 'khor lo'i mthang thug pa'i dog sa la lhags par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi mjed na rin po ches 'phongs par gyur nga pa de'i tshe/ de dag na cu bye nu d+ya mu tig gi blo gros
260b2(mdo): shes bgyi bar gyur pa te/ zhugs ltar gdal zhing kun tu gnas par gyur dacig/ de yang de nas mngon par 'phags te gong du 'og myin gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar tu gnas nas/ me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'byebs
260b3(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing / me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / pa ri ya tra ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzeswa dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ma na ba na dang / zla ba dre myed dang / pad ma brgya
260b4(mdo): pa dang / mdab stong pa dang / kun tu 'od dang / kun tu dri dang / shi ri tu mdzes pa dang / rtag tu 'bras bu rgyas dang / snying rje dang myig mngon par dga' dang / skar 'od dang / skar mdog dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang
260b5(mdo): dri mtha' yas dang / me tog de lta bu dag gi me tog gi cher chen po ma don par rab tu 'bebs par gyur daH ke/ me tog gi char de dag las kyang sgra sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing 'di lta ste/ 
260b6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gi sgra dang / dge bsnyen sdom pa'i sgra dang / 'phags pa'i gsol sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dang / rab tu byung ba'i bsrab pa'i gzhi bcu'i sdom pa sbyin
260b7(mdo): ba'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / tshangs par pyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i sgra dang / 'al bgyid pa'i sgra dang / klog pa'i sgra dang / nang tu yang dag 'jog gi sgra dang
260b8(mdo): tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i sgra dang / myi sdug pa'i sgra dang / dbugs rgyu ba dang rngub pa'i sgra dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi sgra dang / ci yang myed pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
261a1(mdo): kyi sgra dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang / zad par gyi skye mched kyi sgra dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i
261a2(mdo): sma dang / smon pa ya mchis pa'i sgra dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra dang / nyan thos kyi sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam pha rol tu phyind pa mtha' dag gi sgra dag me tog de dag las 'byung
261a3(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis zos par gyur da nas/ rang rang gi sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing / sems can chen po de dag dge ba'i chos thams cad la
261a4(mdo): smon pa ma mchis par gyur de nas/ de dag de nas babs te 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed kyi myi thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god par gyur da cag// de bzhin tu 'dod pa na pyod pa'i lha
261a5(mdo): thams cad kyis kyang thos par 'gyur zhi da/ de dag kyang sred pa'i ku/ na tu spyod pa dang / dga' ba dang cad mo dang / yid bde ba la mdo// na par dga' ba'i sems dang sems las 'byung ba thams cad rkyad
261a6(mdo): cad par gyur da cig/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rapa rang gis sngon cad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i pha ba dag rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing / de dag lha'i 'jig rten nas babs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
261a7(mdo): mched kyi myi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug cing / rab tu 'god par gyur da cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog de dag kyang nam mkhal sa rin po che sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur
261a8(mdo): gang 'di lta ste/ dngul dang mgron bu dang / gser dang nor bu/ mya tig dang / bye dud+ya dang / dngul dang / man sel dang/ byi nu dang / dung cad dang / sa le skam dang / rdo'i snying po dang / g.yas su 'khyil pa dang / de lta bu'i rin / 
261b1(mdo): che'i char dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mched thams cad tu mngon par tu 'bab par gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed thams cad na/ zab mo dang 'thab pa dang / cod pa dang 'gyel pa dang / mug ge dang / nad dang / 
261b2(mdo): pha rold kyi dpag tshogs dang / tshig chub cing bcang pa dang / drag+sa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad tu rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed tu thams cad du bde ba dang nad pa mchis pa dang
261b3(mdo): zab po dang / 'thab pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'ching ba dag ma mchis pa dang / lo legs pa dag kun tu gnas par gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag gis rin po che de dag mthong ba dang / reg pa dang longs
261b4(mdo): spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa'i lam bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar myi ldog par gyur da cig/ sku gdung de dag kyang slar gser gyi 'khor
261b5(mdo): lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar tu gnas par gyur da cig// / bam po / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rma/ tshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang de dag nor bu rin po che/ 
261b6(mdo): an ta d+hil rag tu kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag steng du 'og byin gyi mthang thug pa'i zab tu gnas nas 'di lta ste/ me tog man dang pa dang / man pab chen po dang / pha la~M la tra ka dang / me tog 'ad mtha/ 
261b7(mdo): las kyi ser gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi chang dag mngon pa du tu 'bedra par gyur da cig/ me to gi cha de dag las kyang ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar bzhin du 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'argya
261b8(mdo): skra dang / sgra yid tu 'ong ba snga chags rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar gyur da cig/ yang sku gdung de dag kyang srang 'og tu gzar gyi mthang la 'i mthar thug pa'i bamargya gnas par gyur dacig// de bzhin tu gang gi rtse
262a1(mdo): mug ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na/ sku gdung de dag steng du 'og myin gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar 'phags nas/ me tog gi chang gi bar dag sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur da cig/ nad kyi bskal pa dang
262a2(mdo): tha ga ma'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur da cig/ ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po la bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams storang pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / 'dul ba bgrang ba las
262a3(mdo): yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar myi ldog pa la 'god par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag byung gi bar r+ya yang bdag gi sku gdung rnams
262a4(mdo): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir myi ldog pa la 'god par gyur pa cig/ bdag byang chub sems dpa 'gyurd cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa
262a5(mdo): pa spyod pa na/ gang dag bdag gis dang por/ za na myed pa yang dag pad rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu gsal cing // rab tu/ 'god pa rnams dang / bdag gis pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / 
262a6(mdo): drug po dag yang dag par 'dzind tu stsal ci btsud de rab tu 'god pa de ga slad kyis gang gi tshe/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang 'ga'i klung ki bye ma snyed 'das nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
262a7(mdo): ma mchis pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sha stag tu 'gyur te/ 'byung bar gyur da cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu stsal cing
262a8(mdo): btsud te rab tu 'god pa'i sems can rnams dang gdag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam par sprul pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur na pa'i byang chub sems dpal de dag kyang
262b1(mdo): srad kyis bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed byung zhing 'das par 'gyur da pa na/ phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ 
262b2(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di skad du gang yun ring po na bskal ba bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur da te/ bskal chen po bzang po de la bab pa na/ rgyal ba nyi ma bzhil pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gsas
262b3(mdo): pa mtshan 'di zhes pa zhig byung bar gyur da pa des/ bdag cag dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud te rab tu 'god do// bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud
262b4(mdo): tshig pa/ myi dge ba dang 'grogs par gyur da pa/ 'tshams myed pa byed pa/ sog par lta ba'i bar tu rgya dad pa yin na/ des bdag cag pha rol phyind pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin
262b5(mdo): tu bcug cing bcud te rab tu 'god pas na/ de'i phyir bdag ga da ltar thams cad mkhyend par gyur da cing rnam pa thams na du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la/ 
262b6(mdo): 'gro ba'i 'khor lo// zlog cing sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho ris dang / tha dad pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no// zhes bdag gis bsngags pa brjod cing / sgrogs
262b7(mdo): la dbyangs kyang brjod par gyur da cig/ dge ba'i che ba des de dag de nas ldang bar 'gyur zhingapa/ sangs rgyas kyi shing 'dir myi'i 'thob pa thob par yang gyur da cig// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dus
262b8(mdo): bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing / mchog nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur dacig/ sems can de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas par gyur da nas/ yang de'i slad du bdag 'gum nas sems nan dmyal
263a1(mdo): ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzind kyis kyang myi tshol ba dag 'byung bar gyur de cig/ bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i
263a2(mdo): rgyal po ri ba tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur da cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang / 
263a3(mdo): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur da cig/ bdag gi sus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba sdug bsngal drag pa chub pa myi badra pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rtul phra rab kyi rgyal
263a4(mdo): snyed dag myor bar gyur da cig// de ltar phyogs bcu'i na rkyen gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshul ma rab kyi tshul snyed de/ kan sems can gang dag mtshams la mchis pa bgyid pa dang / 
263a5(mdo): mnar myed pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i las dag yang dag par sngogs par gyur da pa rnams dang / sems can gang dag bsku la pa chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing gargyas phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar
263a6(mdo): 'dag 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul ma rab kyi tshul snyed do/ gzhar dag tu mtshams pa mdzes pa'i mas kyis 'phel par byungang ba 'am/ kun nas spong bar 'gyur/ 
263a7(mdo): bde dag thams cad kyi don tu bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnad myed par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gi sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyu da cig/ sems
263a8(mdo): de dag sems cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma nyes par 'gyur ba dang / 'khom pa lasags par 'gyur ba dang / mya nganas pa 'das pa'i drong gyis rgya mjug par 'gyu ba'i yun riba'o// 
263b1(mdo): de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las
263b2(mdo): kun nas bra ba ba dang / 'phangs pa dang / myong bar 'gyur bas nges pas/ sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye sar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tsha ba dang / ngu 'bod dang / bya 'bod chen po dang / bsdus gzhom dang / thig nag du
263b3(mdo): yang sos kyi rang dag la yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag pa la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gan
263b4(mdo): sbyin dbul po la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du grul bum dang / sha zal dang / lha mo yin dang / ram mkha' lding dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi
263b5(mdo): zhingang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sems can rnam sa sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur da pa dang // de bzhin sbyar te/ gang dag kyi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang long ba dang / 
263b6(mdo): lce ma mchis pa dang / lag pa ma mchis pa dang / rkang pa ma mchisapa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar gyurard pa dang / myi srung ba za bar 'gyur ba rnams la yang de bzhin
263b7(mdo): du sbyar te/ ji ltar sngang smos pa bzhin du yang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar myed pa dag tu skye bar gyur da cig/ gal te bdag blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yab de lta bu yongs su rdzogs
263b8(mdo): bar myi 'gyur ba lta na 'khor ba du sems can rnams yun ring por ji srid tu khams dang / skye mched dang / phung po yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du sems can
264a1(mdo): dmyal ba dang / hud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po rnams su myi'i bad kyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa/ de lta bu dag gis de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su
264a2(mdo): myong bar ma gyur da cig/ dzaM ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar go za na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
264a3(mdo): bdag gi dbang du gyur da cig/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dgan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kar dag 'khrugs te/ 'chol zhing gzhes pa
264a4(mdo): chos kyang 'tshal pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ra tu 'byung zhing ye shes su gyur da cike/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sapra
264a5(mdo): rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag bsgrub par rdo thog cing / bdag bskal / pa bzang po la skye dgu tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
264a6(mdo): ma rig pa 'bas su ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bang tu 'gyur ba stan/ bdag thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyong chub tu srung bstan tug mos de nas de'i mod la/ de bzhin
264a7(mdo): gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dpa nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchis rab tu 'jug bzhin byung / 
264a8(mdo): chub don bya gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gi bsngags pa dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa thos par gyurang nas/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad du/ bcom
264b1(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des don gyi dpang ci zhig gzigs na de ltar phod pa'i dus la bab cing / snyigs ma lnga 'byung bar 'gyur pa na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
264b2(mdo): par sangs rgyas par gyur da cig ces yongs su zhu bar gyur da cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
264b3(mdo): sems dang po bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di yang ston par gyur da cig/ byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang de ma tshad du
264b4(mdo): 'dzind par gyur daci/ de dag kyang rgya chen po la mos khar gyur da cig/ de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par 'gyur zhing de ltar 'arjod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa
264b5(mdo): snyigs ma 'od pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / myi dge ba'i bar dag dang / 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzind par gyur da ca ke/ de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'des
264b6(mdo): bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs me lnga dang / nyon mongs pa bod pa'i brtsod pa'i rjes su smom lam
264b7(mdo): btab pa bzhin du byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs ba kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstand pas lung stond par gyur da cig
264b8(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag kyang sems can byang chub don bu gnyer ba'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad du/ yun ring po 'dir srid ni ga na rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba
265a1(mdo): zhes byang bapa 'gyur pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / rnam par 'phrul
265a2(mdo): ba sna tshogs dag mdzad de/ de'i sku gtung gi 'u/ rnam par 'phrul ba dag gis nged cag dang po p+la na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskal nas nged cag bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
265a3(mdo): pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i ngo phyir dge pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag la yang baphon par byas so// zhes bdag gi sku gtung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i snod kyi tshul
265a4(mdo): dag rgya cher ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar tu rgya cher stond par gyur da cig// / de nas mdun no 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po li spyan sngar lha dang / 
265a5(mdo): dri za dang / myi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rjen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po de dag btang nas des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
265a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bdagri ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang / 'thab mo dang / snyigs ma 'dol zhing bcod pa'i dus la bab pa na 'jig rten mdongs shing 'dren pa
265a7(mdo): ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / lha'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig rten na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / sngar smos pa ltal bu'i bar dag la bdag gi
265a8(mdo): re ba lI lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad bsgrub pa rdo thog pa ldan/ byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang bar myi
265b1(mdo): bgyi zhing / dge ba'i pha ba yang zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar myi bgyid ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi nges pa lags so// yang bdag ni dge ba'i pha ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi thig
265b2(mdo): pa myi 'tshal/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yang myi 'tshalo// lha dang myi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang myi 'tshal/ lha dang mye'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang myi 'tshal/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan kyi long spyod kyang myi 'tshal
265b3(mdo): lhar skye ba yang myi 'tshal/ dri za dang / lha ma yan dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / nam mkha' ldi du skye bar yang myi 'tshal/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs su sngo bar yang myi bgyid te/ gang ya
265b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad tu sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye/ thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/ bsgoms pas ni bral bar 'gyur ro// zhes kyang
265b5(mdo): gsungs la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ sems can ba/ sod nams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa/ sa ni re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsung
265b6(mdo): na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag bdag gis kyang na pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba dang / bsod
265b7(mdo): rnams dag bsgrubs pa na gal te/ bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i pha ma de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis
265b8(mdo): sems can dmyal ba mnar myed par rab tu phub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i sems can dmyal po'i sems can rnams kyi spang du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi mo// de nas dge ba'i yan lag lngas bram ze rgya
266a1(mdo): rdul gyi rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang / sems can mang po rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang / smon lam chen po 'ab mo btab
266a2(mdo): pa ni legs so legs so// / lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing / mtsham myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i che ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba
266a3(mdo): rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no// ji ltar khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des ni sems can rnams kyi sman dang / skyabs dang dpung
266a4(mdo): gnyen tu gyurd par shes so// sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu tha ra da par bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur da cig/ bcom ldan 'das
266a5(mdo): kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba stand par yang gyur da cig// rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid kyang bya zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa// 
266a6(mdo): e ma'o mchog tu zab pa'o// khyod ni bde la myi gnas te// khyod ni sems can snying rdo ldan// khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin// de bzhin du sbyar te/ spyan du gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa
266a7(mdo): sems can chags pa dag la khyod ma chags// dbang po'i rta yul rnams ldang ba brta thul// dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de// gzugs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod tu 'gyur// de bzhin sbyar te/ 
266a8(mdo): mthu chen thob kyis smras pa// sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams// dag pa'i don du kun nas 'dus pa dag// mchog tu dga' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po'i// khyod kyi snying rje la ni du bar byed/ 
266b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpal 'jas dmas kyis snyam pa// brtson 'grus ting 'dzin brtan pa dang // mkhas pa dang shes rab mchog/ 'thang badri dang byug pa yis// dpyir khyod la mchod ma// 
266b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpal nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa// snying rje chen tham sems can la// de ltas khyod kyis sbyin pa byin// khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang // mgani 'i mtshan gi mchog tu 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa
266b3(mdo): rdo rjes gcod pa// shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba// de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas// khyod kyis sems can 'jigs myed lam// byang chub
266b4(mdo): spyod pa dag kyang bstan de// byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa ra sdang byed shugs kyis smras pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la ma gtogs par// sems can la brtse gzhan myed de/ 
266b5(mdo): gang phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog/ khyod ni yon tan kun dang ldan// spos kyi seng ges smra ba// khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ni// bza ba la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe
266b6(mdo): sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing // khyod kyis thags dang snyan pazos// byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smos pa// skye ba'i dkon par brtson gyur cing // lo rgyus
266b7(mdo): gnod tu nyam pa ba/ sha za la dang khrag 'thung ba'i// sems rgyad cig rnams bzung bar 'gyur// myi 'khrugs pas smras pa// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing // nyon mongs 'dam tu bying gyur dus/ 
266b8(mdo): mngam ma byed pa dag byed pa'o// sems spyad cig rnams bzung bar 'gyur// sol gyi mnga'o smras pa// khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba// ji skar mo so dkyis mthong bzhin// dpa' yongs ni grong byed pa/ 
267a1(mdo): sa mchud ce na gzu tu// da namatog gis nas cu gzhisas ting dzid dang / snyide can brgyan pa'o// 'phags la srung ba 'debs byed pa// sems chud cen
267a2(mdo): rnams 'thung bar gyur // 'jig dang dul khrim gyis smras pa// khyod kyis ngan song gsum las du// sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba/ la spong 'drar gnas gyurd pa// sems rgyud cig zhes
267a3(mdo): gzung bar gyur// sag na sud pa las smras pa// khyod kyi sti la zhwa dang / brtson 'grus kyis ni 'khor pa bcom// skye dang 'chibs gzir gyur da pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur/ 
267a4(mdo): grags pas smras pa// nad mang dag gis nyin pa dang // nyon mongs rlung gis ded pa dag/ ye shes chu'i sa zhi byas te// bdud kyi sde nas rab tu bcom// gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa// ji ltar
267a5(mdo): khyod ni nyi ma bzhin// nyon mongs tra ba rab btso te// nyon mod sa zad cing rnam thar pa'i// 'phen 'grus brtan pa nged la byed/ u pal zla bas kyang smras pa/ ji ltar yon tan snying rjen
267a6(mdo): gnas/ brtson 'grus brten la yang dag mos/ srid pa 'i bcing bas rab bsdams pa// 'khams nag sum pa dag grom par byed/ dri myed dbang pos smras pa// byang chub seMs dang
267a7(mdo): spyod yul gyi// snying rje chen po dag bstan pa// snying rje 'ir+g+ha las byung ba'o// khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// stobs chen shugs 'cha kwikya smras pa// nyon mongs ldan pa'i cod dus tshe/ 
267a8(mdo): byang chub gang dag khyod la bted// khyod kyis nyon mos ca nas bcad// smon lam btab 'grub par 'gyur// skang sa skyong gis kyang smras pa/ ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'drab// drim myed man
267b1(mdo): lam btab pa yis// byang chub spyod phyir sems cad gyi// sman dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par stod btu zhing / bram ze'i rkang pa la
267b2(mdo): yan lag lngas phyag byas te// bal mo sbyang nas smras pa// kye ye shes smon sems cadan rnams// nyon mongs nad rnams rnam par bcom// khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can// sems can sdug bsngal krol
267b3(mdo): bar mdzad// rigs kyi bya thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang myi dang / dri za dang / bcas bdag gis kyang bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ don dang tshig sna
267b4(mdo): tshigs dang ldan pa'i tshog su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod/ sa 'khod do// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngang pus
267b5(mdo): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang // de nas de'i bod la sa cher g.yos par 'gyuran cing // phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyas pa rab kyi rdul snyeng dag gi sa
267b6(mdo): g.yos pa/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldegapa kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ud kyi bar tu gyu da nas/ yang phyogs
267b7(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul phra rab kyi snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
267b8(mdo): kazhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag tu yang sdang ba chen po 'byung bar gyurd cing / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu 'bab par gyur da te/ 'di lta ste me tog man da ra ba dang
268a1(mdo): can sna chun / 'a sems dpa' sems / mas/ sa rgyas bamam ldan 'a da/ 
268a2(mdo): kya tu lems dang 'didag/ dkyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du# camam yang mdzan pa rgya pa gyu pa rgyu
268a3(mdo): rkyen da ni gapa lags shes yongasu zhus so// yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gduga'i klung gcig na/ bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gi khams rin po che bsags
268a4(mdo): zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che bsag/ sa pa de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba zhes bya
268a5(mdo): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag gis/ yongs su 'askor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ theg pa chen po'i gtul 'bazhin da'o/ 
268a6(mdo): stond to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo/ 
268a7(mdo): sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs ma rin chen zla la la 'di skad ces gsold to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi cher po dag ra gu bab par gyud pa'i rgyu ni gang lag
268b1(mdo): rkyen ni gang lags de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
268b2(mdo): 'das bde na 'jig rten gi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de med bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
268b3(mdo): zhig 'azhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par stond pa'i smon lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rna grangs 'chad cing byang
268b4(mdo): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond to// de na byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig
268b5(mdo): cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de// byang chub sems dang 'a rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
268b6(mdo): stond pa bshad pa dang / srog chags bye ba brag mang po dag gis/ byang chub tu smon la btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod la de dag kyang yongasu bzung ba dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang
268b7(mdo): yongasu bzung ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing / rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can stegs ma
268b8(mdo): dang ldan zhing / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / 'tshams myed pa byed cing myi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dpa'agrogs la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems/ 
269a1(mdo): dpal sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rno pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
269a2(mdo): kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de sangs nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing / yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i
269a3(mdo): bsngags pa yang brjod par bya'o// sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 'asbyin sngar 'dug cing lung bstand pa nyan to// gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcoM
269a4(mdo): ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar bus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra
269a5(mdo): rib kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon pa ra rab tu bab par gyurd pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// ngas rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sem
269a6(mdo): dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang // snying rje chen po dang / ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smod lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstand par bya ba'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
269a7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ka rdul la rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs na bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ ting pa 'dzin sgo bstand pa gyod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
269a8(mdo): bar bya ba'i byis/ de bzhin gshegs po des de lta bu'i tshe 'phrul dag bstand to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla la ya// byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongasu zhus pa/ btsun pa bco ldan ma
269b1(mdo): gang dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa bdo zhing bzod pa'i dus la bza pa'i dus yongs bzung ste// mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar/ dang
269b2(mdo): 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig 'a'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongasasu bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po 'tsha
269b3(mdo): gcig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing yun ring po ji srid gcig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags// de bzhin gshegs pa rim zla bas bkalas cal pa// rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan
269b4(mdo): pa des ni gdod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sam sa dang po bskyed do// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshe dgas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
269b5(mdo): bo che'i snying po la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par rtog der dpal ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstand pa'i spyod pa/ 'jigs pa myed pa'i
269b6(mdo): chos kyi ni grangs de yang nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la la 'di skad du// de bzhin gshegs po chen chen tha bas/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri 'ang/ 
269b7(mdo): mdzad de/ me tog zla la mdog mdzes dris myed pa 'di yang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltam sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying rje chen po 'arjod pa
269b8(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang / skas gang bas gyurd te/ des khyod kyis thams cad du chen po dang ldan pa zhe bya ba
270a1(mdo): mying rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon le kyis
270a2(mdo): yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan lags par 'jugs par gyur da te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i skal pa grangs myed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jin
270a3(mdo): rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / gags pa'i skams kun tu gang bar gyur ro// gang khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bye brag
270a4(mdo): mang po grangs myed pa dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par dzi nad tu bcug cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
270a5(mdo): pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa la bkod par 'gyur te/ de la kha cig smon la gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzind pa 'gyur la gang yin pa dag ni phyis/ lu bstan
270a6(mdo): pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs myed pa/ sas rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis sbyin
270a7(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag du sangs rgyas nyid thob cing / chos kyi 'khom lo bskor nas de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa ba
270a8(mdo): par gyur da te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smras shing // yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba zag gnyis kyis tshig mthun par gsold pa// 
270b1(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin
270b2(mdo): gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis leg so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing // me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di skur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtag
270b3(mdo): der mchi lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bkalas med pa// rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na dpal der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge
270b4(mdo): 'dzind gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa myed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas rin po che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las/ 
270b5(mdo): me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa blangs te/ byang chub sems dpal dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan gcig tu 'jig rten gi khams rin po che bsags pa nas 'phags nas/ 
270b6(mdo): 'di lta ste dper na glog bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bsags pa des nas myi sdang bar gyur da ta/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyes
270b7(mdo): mos cha la 'dir lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la 'a der dong ste phyind pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po' zhibs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rna
270b8(mdo): par 'phrul brda pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i rgyan snga na bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo skya rang tsang
271a1(mdo): bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpal de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas gapal me tog zla ba mdog mdzes tri ma myed pa 'di dag bskur ba'i snying rje
271a2(mdo): ched po dang ldan 'de ni 'di yin pa la snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpal de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze la ma tog dulanas 'di skad ces kyang smras so// skyes du
271a3(mdo): dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag bskur te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la leg sra so zhes bya ba yang spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa
271a4(mdo): bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed la grangs myed pa dag nas/ byang chub rnams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mngon
271a5(mdo): mdzes tra mi myed pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang / bram ze la me tog dag bskur ba dang / yan lag gsuM gyis legs so zhes bya ba sbrir pa yang ji ltar
271a6(mdo): sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du lce phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bye brag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi zhes pa na/ 
271a7(mdo): sa bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba ge gis bsgyings pa de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge ltar bsgrengs
271a8(mdo): kha'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhug te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po 'ba' zhib dag la/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos stond to// 
271b1(mdo): 'khor de na byang chub seMs dpal seMs dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i rtog ces bya ka cig zhos ni seng ge rdo rje'i tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de
271b2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa ser ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongasu zhus / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog char chen po bab par gyur da ba'i rgyu ni kapa lags/ rkyend ni gang lags
271b3(mdo): zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te sngo phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa gzhan dang gzhan dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag zhig
271b4(mdo): 'bum phrag dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rto gra tu lhags pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de 'i tshe na nub phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi/ 
271b5(mdo): zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bye brag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig/ yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul pa yangs pa
271b6(mdo): s+yan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsuM gis chos stond to// de na byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang // bya
271b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng ge/ ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba / sangs pa'i spyan la/ sa cher g.yos na/ 
271b8(mdo): me tog gi char chen po bab pa ma las gyur ces don de yongasu zhus pa'i bam du yang ji ltar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
272a1(mdo): khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pan/ 'jig rten gi khams tud skyig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das kyi
272a2(mdo): zhig thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpal 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la// gcig ni myi gso
272a3(mdo): brtan pazhi bya gcig zhon zhes 'dzin ces bya ste// de gnyis kyis de bzhin gzhag pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa ched g.yos zhing / me tog gi chang ba la
272a4(mdo): bya da pa'i rgyu ni gang lag/ rkyen ni gang la kA zhes yong su zhus ba'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na ga gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
272a5(mdo): shing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcum brgyad 'das pa de na 'jig rten ki khaMm gti mug sun thal zhe bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin/ gsheg la kun nas ldang ba'i 'jig pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs zhes byab
272a6(mdo): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa ga suMgs chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni rnam pam snang byed rdul bral zhes bya ba gcig shos
272a7(mdo): ni rnam par snang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gi khams me tog kun
272a8(mdo): tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas bde na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rang rgyas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te/ 
272b1(mdo): 'tsho zhing bzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsuM gi chos stond to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig khod do// gcig ni rang gis rna bar 'byed pas
272b2(mdo): yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa zhes bya/ gcig shos na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rno bar 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/ skyes bu dam de gnyis kyis// de bzhin gsheg
272b3(mdo): parnam par mdzad me tog rab rgyas la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po 'ab par gyurard pa'i rgyun keng lags// rkyen ni gang lags/ zhes zhus pa dang
272b4(mdo): de bzhin gzhogs pa nye bar snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' saHlad pa// rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum
272b5(mdo): 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten po khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i papo zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ba mnan/ 
272b6(mdo): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhis la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' yul dang / zhing yang dag par stonod pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos
272b7(mdo): ni grangs 'chang cing // byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stang rje
272b8(mdo): chen po dang ldan pa cig cig yod pa des/ smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongasasu bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa
273a1(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa bshad pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du smon lam btab cing / sangs rgyas
273a2(mdo): yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dus pa'i sems can rnams kyang yongasu bzung ba'i smon lam da lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad dang po'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing / thod pa'i dus kyi sa
273a3(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams myed pa byed pa da myi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa la/ sos kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dus pa
273a4(mdo): thams cad yongasu bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / 
273a5(mdo): myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba sangs na snying rje chen po dang ldan po phye ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson
273a6(mdo): zhing / yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyor cing 'dug nas/ de'i bsngag pa yang brjod par byed do// sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gzhag pa rin po che'i snying po la spyan snga na
273a7(mdo): 'dug cing lung bstanang pa nyan to// gang gi semams can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar bum mo gams pa'i lhangs la btsugs par gyur pa da'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'od lta ste/ phyogs du
273a8(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chen po dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos sheng/ 'gul ba dang / me tog gi tshar gyi bar dag kyang
273b1(mdo): mngan ma rab tu bas par gyur 'de sa bu'i 'udul pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu padas bya ba dang / snying rjechen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub
273b2(mdo): dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa/ nges par bstand par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / 
273b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la// ting nge 'dzin gi sgo bstand pa'i 'jig pa myed pa chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i byer/ de bzhin gsheg pa des de la bu'i tsho 'phrul dag bstan to// 
273b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gnas pa rnam par sdang mdzad me tog rgyas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ra
273b5(mdo): kis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'azhugs pa dang / gzung sa kyis yang dag par rab tu dka' ba dang/ rnam pa 'khrugs zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongasu zhus pa/ btsun
273b6(mdo): pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyims ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa 'do zhing bzod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongasu bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / myi dge ba'i
273b7(mdo): ba dang 'grog par gyurd cing sems kyi rgyud cig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongasasu gzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ yun ring po rdza
273b8(mdo): srid gcig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cipa/ yun ring po ji srid gcig tu byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' bas lad pa/ rigs kyi bud/ 
274a1(mdo): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni da da bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
274a2(mdo): rin po che'i snying po de la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gi sgo bstand pa'i gyod pa 'jigs pa myed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gi khams yang
274a3(mdo): dag pa rtog dor de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la/ nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rna bar snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa
274a4(mdo): khyod la dI bar9/ me tog zla ba mdog mtshes dri ma myed pa la de dag kyang skur zhing / legs so// zhes bya ba yang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying
274a5(mdo): rje chen po brjod pas phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu skus gang pas gyurd/ sto rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir
274a6(mdo): khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gyi ma rnams la snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams
274a7(mdo): na lags par 'jugs par byed te/ sgros bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'das pa'i skal pa grangs myed pa sangs rgyas kyi gang gi rdul bla rab kyi rdul sna ni thugs 'acu'i 'jig rten gi khams sa
274a8(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yab dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang grags pa'i ga/ kun tu gang bar 'gyuro// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems cad bye ba khrag khrig 'bru brag mang mo grangs
274b1(mdo): myed pa dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing bcud de/ rab tu bkod na/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
274b2(mdo): phyir myi ldog pa la bkod par 'gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zad nas smon lam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongasu bzung ba dag dang / 'dul ba'i sems nus
274b3(mdo): kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu bkab par gyur da to// gang dag khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug nas/ lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyes
274b4(mdo): lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs myed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis/ phyogs bcu'o 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas
274b5(mdo): kyi zhing gi rdul rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid nab cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba nas/ khyod nyid las brtsams shing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum
274b6(mdo): po des na/ skyes bu dam khyod legs so// zhes kyang smos ni ga/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bya ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
274b7(mdo): ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / de bzhin gagags pa dag com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rim mo che'i snying po de blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin
274b8(mdo): gsheg pa gapa la yan lag gsum kyis leg so zhes bya ba spring zhing / me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag skur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ya dag tog de/ 
275a1(mdo): mchis lag so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pA snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka'asaHyad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la da bab par shes khyed cag depa la/ de bde bzhin gshegs
275a2(mdo): pa rin po che'i snying po las/ ting nge 'dzind gi sgo bstan pa'i gyod pa 'jigs pa myed pa'i/ chos kyi na grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rna
275a3(mdo): 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrug pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rno bar 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba do gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de
275a4(mdo): las me tog zla mdzes dri ma myed pa dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag tu ma dang lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa nas 'phags te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas
275a5(mdo): kyi zhing 'dzam bu tshal gyi skyed mos 'tshal tu lhags te phyi nad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la bar de dadong // yang de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
275a6(mdo): zhing yang dag rtog theg po chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' na/ mas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / nyan thog kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dag dang / lha rnams dang / lho bya
275a7(mdo): chen po 'bir dag gis 'di ltar yongasu gang bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ bu rab shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam// til gi shing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab
275a8(mdo): bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis yongasu gang zhing khyab par gyur to// 
275b1(mdo): sa/ kya de sa na 'dzi sa sa/ byang chub sems pa yin pa ma
275b2(mdo): mdzu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'ad da// 'di sas ma mas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam lnga snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gangs me tog tham mdog sangs dri ma myed pa 'di dag
275b3(mdo): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa'ade dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir khyog te/

275b6(mdo): yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing sdong po dag tu charang bzhin rab tu bab pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i ldan pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun tu gang bar gyurd te/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas
275b7(mdo): ska dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gi sgra dang / sdang ba'i skra dang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sku dang / myi 'jig pa'i skra dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i skra dang // skye ba myed pa'i skad
276a1(mdo): 'gag pa myed pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i skra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i skra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i skra dang / byams pa skra dang / snying rje chen po'i skra dang / myi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang bskur de zol pa ni

276a3(mdo): che ba mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa// gang dag 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i byor/ smon gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhag pa de dag gis ska de thos nas/ sangs rgyas
276a4(mdo): kyi mthu dang / smon lum gi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin gi stobs kyis de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gi 'di ltar mgyogs pa dong ste/ 'di lta ste dab na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du byang chub
276a5(mdo): sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhi po sa de dag nas dang ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag rtog 'dir lhags rnas byu sems dpam da dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'a 'jum
276a6(mdo): khanal pa gatshogs dag gas / de bzhin gshegs pa rin batsho'i snying po la mchod pa byas shing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'kho yang mchod pa byas nas/ chom mnyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thol bar 'khod do// 
276a7(mdo): kyi brgyad da 'ad ga gama'abras po rgyamatsho du 'des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa na ma ma ming ba de sa me tig zlab mdog me sa sa byed pa de dgags yod sa rgyab tugs pad/ tsun
276a8(mdo): ldan 'das bdag can kyad pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ rigs kyi bu nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po tshang myong sa ting 'dzin srog ni ston pa zhes bya bas snyoms 'thug / 
276b1(mdo): ting 'dzid de dpa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs kyis kyi zhing sa dag tog/ rin po sa bdun karang bzhin du gnas par gyud nas// ro dang / gang ljon la rnams dang / mtha dang shing dang / sa gan thams cad kyang rig pa
276b2(mdo): bcud gi rab bzhin du kun tu sdang ngo // sems can gang dag chos nyan 'a'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyog ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser ro// kha cig ni kar ro// Sha cig ni bcod Sha/ kha cig ni dam /

276b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu de nas sems can de dag gis rang rang gisus po lta bum mthong ba/ ded lta bub sems can de dag gis de bzhin gzhags pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'dun na 'dzadagags
276b7(mdo): bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang 'dun na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ni po che sna bdud gyi pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i thel la bzhugs par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang dag sa dang
276b8(mdo): nam mkhal la 'dug pa 'am/ 'greb pa'i sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 'di ltar mthong ste// bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/ thugs thams cad kyis
277a1(mdo): dgongs shing / bdag cig pu sas te/ tsam ston byags so// rigs kyi su de bzhin gshegs pa dag btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i las rgya mtshan ma ma mang pas / thas pa ma tsham

278b7(mdo): 'du gyu dad cig/ bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te/ yun ring du gnas shing skal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang / gdul sra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa rnams la// chos
278b8(mdo): stond par gyur dacig ces smon lam de lta bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ des na ye shes dang bsams pa la mkhas pa gyu rad pa yang ma yin la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
279a1(mdo): chen po zhes kyang myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga las 'od gzes kha dog sna tshogs/ kha tog tu ma / 'bru brag tu ma dag dang ldan pa dag

279a3(mdo): mthe bo can de na/ mya rnams ni tshe lo bcu pan mdog ngan pa/ myi stug pa/ myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/ khru ni the bo'i tsid tsam mo// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skad
279a4(mdo): mal dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul/ khrun yang cod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi myi rnams kyi khru gang dang / mthe bo tsam gyi myi rnams kyi khru gang dang / sor bdun gi tshad tsam ste/
