279a7(mdo): dga' ba des skal pa dpag tu myed grangs pa 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i yun sngar dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de/ 
279a8(mdo): srogachags bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po dag than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug tsang brgyad de rab tu bkod do// sems cad de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs padzin mo
279b1(mdo): 'igadugs mngon par 'grus 'ang snang ba'i spyan sngar bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu dag pa dag yongasu bzung ngo // 'aci
279b2(mdo): gis ni yongasu ma dag pa snyigs ma lA dang ldan pa dag yong su bzung ngo do// de sems can chen po des/ pa yang bla na myed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing dang / bzhag ste rab tu gan
279b3(mdo): bar byas nas / der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
279b4(mdo): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab po / de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang ngal log so zhes bya ba byin nas dbri byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand do// 
279b5(mdo): de na gang gis dbyang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lda shind tu 'arda zhing nyon mongs pa dang yod pa'i dus la bab pa'i gyi/ shin kyi nyon mo
279b6(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam bar zhugs pa
279b7(mdo): dag smon le gyis yongasu bzung nas/ skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed grangs myed pa gzhan dang gzhan dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes// ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
279b8(mdo): 'das rnams kyis kyang legs zhes po nye btung ste/ stong rgyan po rnam par snang byed na sa zhes bya bas yong kyi btag so// nga dag pa'i bzhes gnyen mad par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dang masems
280a1(mdo): chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba der ltar 'jig rten gi khams mthe bo tsam tu / mthe bo'itshed tsam gyi myi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs pa ra sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ 
280a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tshad tsam kyi myi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad kyis skye dag tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor da te/ des dang po bla na myed pa yang dag
280a3(mdo): nga rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi zhes tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na bzhags teg 'tsho/ 
280a4(mdo): zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ pho nya dag btang ngo // de dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar dag yang dag
280a5(mdo): par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gi byas pa bzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro// bram ze sang
280a6(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na sems can tshe ring ba bsam pa yong su dag pa bde ba gnas pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang
280a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dka' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs pa lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas sems can mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba ni
280a8(mdo): rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur pa' bar dag la che thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma bsangs par chos stond pa sa ltos/ 
280b1(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing // stsogs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'tshams myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongasu/ 
280b2(mdo): bzung zhing smon lam khyad par can btab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to// byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'dra/ 
280b3(mdo): 'i skye gnas yongasu sangs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yongasu sangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag pa rnams yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shi nad tu 'dul / 
280b4(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongasu bzung ba'i sems cad de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag shi nad tu dul / dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 
280b5(mdo): pad ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no// bram ze byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par
280b6(mdo): smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongasu dag pa rjes la sngas rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam myi ston pa ston par smon pa dang / 
280b7(mdo): byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te// des na byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams shes bya'i/ pad ma dkar po lta bu/ 
280b8(mdo): nga sa yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyi bya ste/ bram pa 'di lta ste dper na byang chub dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'drag chung gis gang gi phyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi yong su ma dag
281a1(mdo): 6/ yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas bkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongasu bzung ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal rnams kyi 'thon 'grus/ 
281a2(mdo): brtsams pa'i dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu ma dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongasu ma dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongasu ma dag pa zhes
281a3(mdo): la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa smond pa dang byang chub tshab nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gtam ston pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe gtsang yang mye ring gtsang yang myi thung zhing / bar mar skul spoms
281a4(mdo): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dkar po de lta bu rnams shes bya'i// me tog lta bu rnams
281a5(mdo): shes myi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' na po rnams shes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste dper na khyod/ ni da ltar smon lam gi dbang gi de bzhin de bzhin gsheg pa'i
281a6(mdo): spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung snyan pa'i zhing du rje pad ma dkar po lta bur skye ba yin no// gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas mtshams myed
281a7(mdo): ba byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan dadong bar gyu dad pa'i bar ge 'dul ba rnams yongasasu bzung zhing skyigs ma lnga 'od pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni yongasasu bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom lda
281a8(mdo): 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la len so zhes bya ba byin te// pho nya dag kyang btang nas khyod kyi snying rje chen po dang ldan la zhes bya bar btag so// 'khor 'i
281b1(mdo): dngas myed pa'i dang pa'i klung go tu po nyid gnyis po man can ya pa 'dug la 'jig rten go khams kyi mjed de skyed du rtsos kyirgya nyin thubacing zhab dang / 'artsam mang ba'i
281b2(mdo): zhing na/ 'jig rten mongs pa/ dzin pa myed po myi dge ba'i rtsa la dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa/ nyam pa'i chen po thom pa mtshams myed pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la sku
281b3(mdo): ga'adebs padz+ra/ ngom pa'i chos yong la ltung ba'i rtsa 'byu nadas ji skad sngang smos pa la bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rtenade bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa nas
281b4(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur te/ 'groli 'khor lo ni bzlog/ chos kyi 'khor lon ska/ da sbyar ba'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcil te/ 
281b5(mdo): phyogs baHmi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthal yos su med pa dag tu sa khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi nyan thos brgyas pachen po ngan 'byems 'di lta ste/ dag slong stong nyis brgyal lnga bcu dang ldan cin
281b6(mdo): smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du lo bcu rtsa lngas rims kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yong su rdzog par 'gyu ro// de'i tshe na ji ltar rgyal po chen po brgyad ci dag pasas dpag myed ces bya bar 'gyur
281b7(mdo): zhing / bskal pa tshad myed pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa drag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten ka khams kyi mjed dang skye dgu'i rtsamo// 
282a1(mdo): brgya nyin rngub pa na de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub zhes bya bar 'gyur te// lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na myed pa'i yongasu mya ngan
282a2(mdo): las 'da' brag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par 'gyuro// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang lus skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gi smon lam
282a3(mdo): ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/ sngar ci skad smos pa de bzhin du yun ring pos sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe gnas
282a4(mdo): grong zhes bya ba na bram ze zhig yod pa des 'di skad smras so// skyes bya dam pa khyod bskal pa gangs myed pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na / bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing khyams pa dang
282a5(mdo): 'thun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang / grogs byed par gyu dad nas khyod// la bsnyed bkur byed par gyur da cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma pa ru gyurd pa na bdag khyod kyi phra bya dad cig/ skyes sha dam pa bdag
282a6(mdo): khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing khyod kyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyurard cig/ gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo sha nid tu dul
282a7(mdo): 'iblo zhes bya ba des kyang smos pa/ bskal pa grangs myed pa de dang / de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tham pa'i bar du gyur da pa na/ bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyurd cig/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
282a8(mdo): kyi tshum man/ bad pan byed pa na/ rdzogs pa kyi tu lung tsud pa bya // rgya gang shi snyam rgya / dad na da
282b1(mdo): srid la ma ba'i 'du gyur da ba na bdag khyod sum pa'i sa ma byed pa'i ma gyur date/ khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stodad par gyur da cig/ rgya byi mu zhus
282b2(mdo): chen zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang rgya zin pha rold sems shes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa// kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dpe de dag ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis byang chub tho bral zhes bya
282b3(mdo): bar du steng / bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dngag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nyan thos zung du gyur da cig/ gzhan yang rgya byid khyad pa spyod pa lta mdzes tshogs shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sbyi
282b4(mdo): rje chen po dang ldan pa dag kyang khyed de dang de dag ces bya ba nas pa sridapa tha ma'i bar du gyur da cig/ gzhan yang ri ma'i lha monges pa kyi shu ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen mo
282b5(mdo): dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu/ khyod kyi btsun mo gyurd cig/ khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla namyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ung stond par
282b6(mdo): gyur da cig/ lha ma yin gi dbang po mdzes khyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs myed pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa gyod pa na/ bdag kyang skyes
282b7(mdo): bya dam pa khyod la byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad kyis gogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur da te/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyurd cig/ khyod srid pa tha mkha gyur da pa la yang bdag bsnyen 'a
282b8(mdo): byed par gyur cig// skyes bu dam la khyod kyis khyong chub thob nas kyang chom dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khom lo ba skor ba mo phyir nasol la 'de'as par gyurang cig/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa dog nis
283a1(mdo): dang por 'das bu dang bcas par byed par gyur dacig/ chos kyi brgyad kyang 'thung bar gyur da cig// 'chi ba myed pa yang rtogs pagyur dacig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs pa'i byom dan bcom pa nyid
283a2(mdo): kyim sa thal bar gyur ci/ de bzhin gyi sbyar te de sa ga dang / skudapa sgra ma yin gang ka'i klu gi kyi sa skyed dag gis kyang / brje chen po dang ldan 'di'i myod pa'i rjes su 'jug pan byor smon lam khatas
283a3(mdo): 'phrul ga dag kyang nye bar bkod do// de na 'tsho ba pa gyi 'gyur 'jog myed ces bya ba cig 'jug pa des smras pa/ kye thal po chen po bdag kyang / tsu la ma byed ma po dang / ni margan pa khyod 'di gyur ci// 
283a4(mdo): bdag bskal la dpag tu myed pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang sa par spyod pas nye bas 'tsho 'a'i ba tu gyur da cig/ rtag tudangos po bslab pa'i do tu khyod kyi chung ngu nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur
283a5(mdo): mal cha dang / sman dang / zag pa dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / kong dang / gong khyer dang / go pad la dang / khyim dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / shadang / khrag dang / bzhes pa dang / nus pa dang / 
283a6(mdo): lag pa dang / dang / na 'du/ snang / byed dang / dag spang bar gyur ni// tham mchen po 'das da ltas khyod kyi sbyin pam par megs byid ma srog su kyar da/ shesar kyi ros da phyin
283a7(mdo): gnas sam par gcig/ chom kyi spo po brgyad ma 'a da par gyur cig/ rjesu chos sod 'du kyi/ khyod kyi'i bdag blan myed yang don mi rjod ma pa'i rtsa tsu ci srang gad pa // 
283b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu bram ze snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin pa che'i phung po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas/ 'chos pa kyi 'gyur 'jigs myed la mas pa/ byes bu dpa 'ad pa
283b2(mdo): bla na myed pa gyod pa'i gogasu 'gyur ba ni/ la ga so leg so khyod ce rabs zhag khrig 'bru phrag tshad myed pa gangs/ myed pa'i bar du pa la dngos po spong ba'i phyi nam 'ongs pa de'i tshe ngas kyang sems rab tu dang bas/ sbyin par bya ste/ 
283b3(mdo): khyod la yang bsod nas ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur da cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'agyen sngar yang gsol
283b4(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa bye khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis gangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa pyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bdag gis
283b5(mdo): mudun du slongs mo pa gang dag mchis nas zas spong bar bgyid cing tshig 'dzam po 'am/ tshig rtsub po 'am brnyas pa'i tshig gam chi/ sa la ba spong bar gyur da na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bdag gi
283b6(mdo): blangs mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro la bskyed par gyurd tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur da tam/ sbyin badzi na 'ar sbyid pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas sbyin la sal bar gyurd na/ 
283b7(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten go khams dpag tu ma mchis/ gangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na gzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyur dacig
283b8(mdo): bdag kyang blan byed la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa su bya sa pa gyur cin// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das g.yo te bdag gis slongs so lal semasas dad pas/ skyon pa ga soyod tam/ 
284a1(mdo): sbyin pa de la yang len pa po la dad pa byin par 'gyur zhing / chud za bar 'gyur ram/ gal te tha na ska'i rtse mo 'chashas kyi tshad tsam zhig dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad byed par gyu rad na/ bdag
284a2(mdo): kis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyurd cig/ gal te skra'i che mo'ichi shas kyi tshad tsam zhig len pa po'i dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyod par gyurd na/ bdag kyang ma nar myed
284a3(mdo): par mchi bar gyur da cig/ zas la ji la lnga bzhin du slongs mo ba gang dag bdag la gos dang mgo'i bar dag slong nyam 'gyur zhing / tshig 'jam po 'am/ tshig rtsub po 'am/ brnyas tshig ga
284a4(mdo): tshig gsal bas mgo'i bar dag slong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro bo'o sems bskyed par gyur da ta ma
284a5(mdo): ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyu da tam sbyin pa'i rnam pa smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas mgo bo'i bar dag yongasu gtong bar gyur da na padag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a
284a6(mdo): rnams bsdus par 'gyur ba nas bdag myed pam 'chi ba'i bas du gyur da cig// sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin tshul khrims nas/ shes kyi bar dag yongasu gtang pa la yang brjod par bya'o// ri nas
284a7(mdo): kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byind te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis
284a8(mdo): rje chen po gnas pa'i sems kyis smon po de lta bu btab pa ni skyes bu dag/ legs so yig so ra gas kyi bu des thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri na dang / myi dang / lha ma yin da
284b1(mdo): bcas pa 'i 'jig rten gis kyang zhal mo sbyar nas 'khod nas/ de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ smon las de lta bu 'atab pa ni skyes bu de/ 
284b2(mdo): palegaso le gso khyod ni snying rje chen por 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i chos drug gis sems can rnams yang dag par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji ltar sbyin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpal 'tsho la ba
284b3(mdo): 'gyur 'jig myed des smon lam btab pa de bzhin du srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam btab bo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des
284b4(mdo): dzaM ltab 'tsho ba ba myi 'gyur 'jig sa myed kyis smod lam btab pa de bzhin tu / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon// ma de lta bu dag btal ba thos pa dang / de na snying rje chen po dang ldan
284b5(mdo): da mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'dug nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas te mchog tu dgal ba'i yid kyis smras pa/ a la la bdag chos kyi mu ge
284b6(mdo): dang / zad pa'i dus dang / nyon mongs pa chen blo dkrugs shing rtsod pa'i dus na/ snyig ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten mgon myed pa'i dad dpon dang / srung ba myed pa dang / skon ma myed pa dang / byis pa skyag
284b7(mdo): myed pa dang / khor ba rnams kyi lam ston par 'gyur ba dang / 'di ltar bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas tshe rabs gzhan dag tu gang dag bdag gi mgo yin par 'gyur ba dang / myag dang / rna ba dang / 
284b8(mdo): sna dang / lce dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / bags pa dang / nus pa dang / khrag dang / kha zas kyi bar dag len par 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa'i byang chub kyi pyod pa'i gogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed
285a1(mdo): nang mcha rad to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' la mas dpa' chen ma snang rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri mtshal snying po'i rgyan phram 'acug ste/ gsom pa tsu
285a2(mdo): pa bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan gi bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dpag tu ma mchis/ gangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag nas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gi drung du slongs po gang dag
285a3(mdo): 'ar mchi 'ar 'gyur zhing / skyon ring po de yid kye bar du zas sam/ skom de dag blangs par gyur da pa dang / bdag gi sug pa nas za na swA'i che mo 'chi shas kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs par gyudad pa'i sems can de dag/ 
285a4(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs zhal te 'khor pa las / mdas myo 'byed dam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'arang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'a
285a5(mdo): 'jog rten dang phyug yo gnob kyi rgyan snga dang sa byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu 'atas 'o// skyes bu dam pa des smon lam 'i ska 'anyem pa bzhin me pa da
285b1(mdo): gang ka'i grib 'i khyi ma snyed la zhin tu lkug pa snyed du byang chub sems dpam myod la spyad na sa 'di nas sha phyogs logs yog su sa sa rgyal kyi zhing bye sa dag 'dum 'das zhan/ 'jig rten gi khams 'od gse ma ma tan
285b2(mdo): zhes 'askyedags brgya nub pa'i dod hU~M/ phrin myed la yang dga' rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 'du sangs rgyas/ ni gan pa ma pa yang rdzogapa pa'i sangs rgya
285b3(mdo): me tog rdul bral ba bcu pa dbang phyug yang dag mthong zhes bya'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar tu gyur da cig/ lo bzhi tshul las sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas/ zung pa'i ldag pa myed pa'i myur
285b4(mdo): 'das pa'i dbying su zhug mo// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral dbang phyug yang dag mcho yongs mya ngan las 'ad sa nas/ de mi dam the tsha mo rgyal ni cho mA
285b5(mdo): du gnas par gyur to// dam pa'i chos nub nas dam pa'i rjo kyi gzugs nyid yang lo stong du gnas par gyurar to// snying rje na po dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog tshul bram rgyang
285b6(mdo): sa dang phyug yang dag mtha yongasu myu las 'das pa'i chos kyi rgyal dang / dpa mnas kyo gtsu btan gnas pa na dag slong dpe dge slong mi gang dag tshul khrims 'a du/ sdig rnam dang
286a1(mdo): na su dag bamam ldan 'das da bsnanags dang mags sa cad kya / gsum bdaslong bstan te// don slong den
286a2(mdo): dag pa byed nas/ dag bsnyen pa'i gang su dag snga ma khan bzhin du lung ba'i rtsa 'byung la 'gyur ba de dag kyang ston par 'gyugs pa'i dge ba'i ma pa'i rnam par smin pa yod/ de ban de gzhed pa pa sa/ 
286a3(mdo): ma pa dag gas bya ldog 'ang srung bsanadaHsa bu dam kyang dalas btab pa bgasas/ bu gzhan
286a4(mdo): lags te/ kyi rol tu phyi dang paji rje dag thad byed pa yang dag pa rdzonapa pa'i thang rgya kyi srad bgyod pa nas/ byang chub kyi ma shug pa'i spyang bapyod pa'i bdu 'ad/ sa
286a5(mdo): da phyid pam pa sa gyidad pa dang sa byed pa / das la / byad do pang #da/ sadas
286b1(mdo): rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ gangs ma mchis pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhe la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul par gyurd cig/ bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag
286b2(mdo): zar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur da cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bla na byed 'i ye shes thob nas kyang / sems can gang dag bdag gi bstan pa la chos
286b3(mdo): kos dang smyigs zags par gyu da pa las/ ltung ba'i rtsa 'byung bar gyurd pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa can gi lta ba la zhugs par gyuradad pa 'am// dgon mchog gsum la 'khrul bar ma gyur dacig/ nongs pa
286b4(mdo): dang bcas par gyu dad pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gang dag skad cig gcig tsam bdag la stond pa'i 'du shes sam/ gus pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur
286b5(mdo): ba'i sems can de dag las// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis tha na sems can 'ga' tsam zhag sangs shi / theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir myi ldog pA lung bstand par ma
286b6(mdo): kyadad na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar skyo 'gyu
286b7(mdo): bar du gyur da ci/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa'i chos gos chung sbyin pa dbang gyi ska da kyi rnams kyis gum par bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mod bgyid pa dang / mchod pa ba
286b8(mdo): kyi 'tshul dmigs par 'gyum na ma / su da kyar phyinan pa ci/ ga dag padang/ brgyang ladas shes na
287a1(mdo): 'grel pa dang / rnam pas gnod par gyur da pa rnams dang / lan gnod sbyid dbul po rnam lam/ gzhan rje'i 'jig rten 'al sems can gang dag ya cho banas tu smin ma mang bani tsam ma
287a2(mdo): yang 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang 'bra' pa dang / btung ba phun gsum 'tshogs par 'gyur zhing ma pa yong du rdzogs pa gyur cin// lhalam/ rgan pyod nas/ son ma/ rmu
287a3(mdo): yin nas/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ myi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ bral bus la/ 29/ 'am/ sems can gang dag phan tshun zhe 'gras ni khon bcugs ma pa'i gyur da pa rnam
287a4(mdo): ban chu 'byed cing gsul 'od zhugs te// g.yul yod par gyu da pa dmus kyis kyang bdag gi chom gas dung smyigs dran par rjes su dran pas gyur dan/ sems can de dag gling rje'i sems dang 'angam pa'i
287a5(mdo): sems dang / khon myed pa'i sems dang / las su rung ba'i mas su byud da cig/ sems can gang dag g.yul 'khyod la pa'am/ rtsod pa yin
287b1(mdo): bya panas/ bdag gis mdzad pa mtha' dag yong su rdzogs par bgyid na rdo rgya mag sa dang bdag gis chos rnams bsrud par gyum 'dang / bdag gis gzha du ldan paca
287b2(mdo): gcod lajo mya log pa'i bar du gyur da cig/ btsun la bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyi b.raH/ de bzhin gnanas bzhag kyi thub
287b3(mdo): pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod cang / phyag 'tshal 'ama' 'gyur 'di dag thams cad kyang las kyi sgrub pa bral 'gyur zhing / mthar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su mya ngan las 'das pa tha ma
287b4(mdo): skyed pas yongasu mya ngan las 'das 'gyu dang lag so// rigs kyi ni de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i des phyag na/ yas la brkyang ste/ phyag gi 'thil kis byang chub
287b5(mdo): sems dpa' snyid rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' maca yod pa// skyes bu dam pa khyod na srin la na dge ba sa zang du rab tu gtan la 'ab pa yidade/ leg pa lag so//
