312a1(mdo): kyi spyod pas phyi 'gyur ba ni ga ka cad kyi phyong 'al spos de'i tshe bskal pa grangs byed pa 'das dang / dus ngad pa'i tshe garnal pa ched po ud pa la 'dra zhes bya ba byung nas sangs rgyas kyi zhingi 'a kyi 'byung ba zhes byas
312a2(mdo): spong zhing skyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa la 'i gang bzhi pa deng yang brgya byin legs par rnas par snang bar byed ces bya bar bya ngas/ ras 'dzas bu ming ded sems can rnams kying/ pas dang ri'i spyod par mthong ngo // mtho das kyang ma
312a3(mdo): bad byid gnang mya ga gzugs shin du 'jig sa 'gas bu nig du mngo bang gru te/ 'angam bu gling du 'basadas kyi rnams kyi bdud su drug go// ded ni me satho nas can glengs dris pa khyod ci dgos pang/ ga sa nyid
312a4(mdo): dbul bar brgya'o// rjes smras pa la mal khabs dag danam so// de dag gi'i smras pa/ khyod kyi kha zas ji lta bu lags/ ras smras pa kho khon gyi pe/ bsad cingag ste/ myig nga / ji srid 'pho'i bdudu srog gcod par byed
312a5(mdo): dang / ga pa lta pa'i bar da / song bar byed pa dang / ni 'o// gang dag tha byed pa yang nga / yang rdzogs pa'i tu sems paskyed par byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mig pa dang
312a6(mdo): nyan thos kyi theg pangasams bskyed par byed pa dang pal ba kyi mi zhes smras te/ de dang sems ca dag sgral 'dis bdes 'du mapa pad rnyed/ 'jigs pabang myod du 'tsho' theng du
312a7(mdo): srog gcod pa sbas so// ma byed par len pa dang / rtog par lta ba'i bar de dag kyang yangs so// cig gisani bran snyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'byig gas 'i rang sangs rgyas
312a8(mdo): kyi mig par la cig gsen nyin pos kyi theg pa ra sems bskyod de/ gling bzhi pa'i sems cani tham sa cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi sa ma dang / theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod nas/ dang ras smon lam btab pa
312b1(mdo): nam te ba byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi ri ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i phyir bdag gi smon lam 'di yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur da cig/ ji ltar bdag gi'i gling bzhi pa'i sems can rnams
312b2(mdo): dge ba'i lam rnams la nges par sbyang ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ang thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi sems cad thams cad kyis kyang de lta bu'i 'jigs pas bdag mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis kyang sems cad de
312b3(mdo): dag pa'i rtsa mas kyi lam larab tu bkod 'i/ theg pagasam po dag sa yang nges par spyod par gyur cig/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi'o shes ma lnga dang ldan pa dag gamams cad thams cad
312b4(mdo): su'i mas kyis pa sa rab tu bag / pod sa sa // rigs kyi 'a pa ba na ba'i
313a1(mdo): 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob site/ skyes bu'i rtsal chen po de lta bu dag byas so// de bzhin tu sems can dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
313a2(mdo): ba'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// de bzhin tu sems can dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud te rab tu
313a3(mdo): bkod do// de bzhin tu sems can dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag nyan thos kyi theg pa yang / yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// ngas ji srad du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
313a4(mdo): 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing ki rtul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkur byas te/ ngas sangs rgyas re re'i drung nas rgya mtsho'i chu'i thigs pa snyed kyi yon tan dag yongs su bzung ba ma gtogs par ras rang sangs rgyas
313a5(mdo): bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la yang dag mchod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la yang mchod pa byas so// de bzhin du pha dang ma dang / 
313a6(mdo): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams la yang mchod pa byas// ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang snying brtse bas/ rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas te/ da ltar yang rang
313a7(mdo): ki chos kyis tshim par byas pa yin no// theg pa chen po'i mdol snying rje pad ma dkar po las sbyin pa'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// 
313a8(mdo): bam po las lnga la la ste 'a ma la// rigs kyi bu ji ltar ras sangs rgyas kyi na la spyan gyis phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sas
313b1(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rtul byeng yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gzigs pa de dag kyang ngas dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsur de rab tu bkod do// de dag ngas dang po
313b2(mdo): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yab/ yang dag par 'dzand tu bcug pa nas shes kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// de bzhin tu da ltar shar phyogs grogs
313b3(mdo): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbeg tu myed grangs med pa dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas zhug te/ 'tshol zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond pa dag gzigs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ngas dang po bla na myed pa yA
313b4(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing ba tsud de rab tu bkod do// pha rol tu phyind pa drug po da ga gi bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du lho dang / 
313b5(mdo): mra dUr/ byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs rnams su yang brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sa shar phyogs kyi logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhi sa ya phrag dgu dang / 
313b6(mdo): tshig 'bum 'das nas 'jig rten gi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dri byed gzil brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang kyang ston ba gzigs te/ 
313b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de yang ngas dang po tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed de/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so// ngas dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
313b8(mdo): phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so// de bzhin du sbyar te shar phyogs logs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon pa
314a1(mdo): dga' ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzam bu'i chu chung zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhig
314a2(mdo): dga' ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dka' ba yi dbang phyug sgra dbyangs 'od gzer ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi ma gnas pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma zhes bya ba/ 
314a3(mdo): dang / sangs rgyas kya re zhing rgyal ba'i gnas rab ches bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegags pa 'brug smra bslags pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'tsho zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje grags pa zhes bya ba dang
314a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhang shind tu rdul myed ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ stag gi 'od zer ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dga' byed ces bya/ ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi gdugs snying po zhes bya ba dang
314a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mkhon skyong 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa drags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lhun po 'i 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas
314a6(mdo): rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha' zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sdang dpal snying po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal gtog
314a7(mdo): ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde mchog ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun dbyangs lhun po yang dag ston ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa can zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzugs
314a8(mdo): shes ma mas pa bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi nongos tog sna tshogs shes bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri byed kun zhes bya ba dang // rigs kyi gud dag las brtsegs pa'ang phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a
314b1(mdo): dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang stond pa dag kyang ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi mig zigs te/ de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa skyed pa las ngas dang po thar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
314b2(mdo): pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug go// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cang btsud de rab tu bkod nas ngas dang po bla na myed pa
314b3(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te// 'tsho zheng gzhes pa dag gi thad tu phul nas/ der dedag thams cad kyis dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo// de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten
314b4(mdo): gi khams me tog tu tu rgyas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed ka zhi brjid yon tran rgyal po bzhugs pa de'i ka dan rab tu gsos so// de na byang chub sedams dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de myed
314b5(mdo): gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de'i gdan rab tu g.yos pa mthong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid la zhus pa bcom ldan 'das sngonam mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdan rab tu g.yos pa'i rgyu ni
314b6(mdo): kapa lags rkyen ni gang lags// de bzhin gshegs pa des de dag la bka' stsa la dra pa/ rigs kyi gu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya tha ka dgu dang tshig 'bum
314b7(mdo): 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ka zhes pa de dag ltar 'khor bzhi po rnams la sngon gyi tshul las brtsams te/ chos
314b8(mdo): ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ de nas da dang po bra ni byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag pa ro 'di
315a1(mdo): tu bcug te/ gang gis pa dang po bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des pa dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa
315a2(mdo): pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing bzhag te rab tu gnas par byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems de bar gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na des pa dang po sadra
315a3(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi tha da t+ya phul nas/ der ngas dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob ste/ de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de bzhin gshegs
315a4(mdo): bshag kya thub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed na bzhugs te 'tsho / zhes gzhes so// de'i 'khor bzhi po rnams la sngon gyi tshul de nyid las brtsams te chos stand pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byin gyi
315a5(mdo): rlabs pa des nga'i stan pa rabu ga yos so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag yas nga'i tshig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa na la snyun myad la'am/ thugs bde 'am zhes yongs su dri ba'i phyir
315a6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mched du 'gro bar spro ba su yod// de nas de ba zhin gshegs pa dri myed kazi brjid yon tan rgyal po la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang
315a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhing yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa gang dag der snga dro'i dus kyi tshe snang ba chen po mthong nas rnam par 'phrul pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun
315a8(mdo): tu rgyas pa 'ding lhags te/ des dog sa 'di yang yud tsam zhig bskyod cing me tog gi char yang rab tu phab pa de dag lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
315b1(mdo): bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de sa phrag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyis
315b2(mdo): chos kyi nam grangs de yang mnyam pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag mang po de dag rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'phags pa da
315b3(mdo): de dag gis kar logs su bgrod par bya ba ma tshol nas yang de dag gis gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kis de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi 'jig rten gyi khams skye mched gang
315b4(mdo): ro la na mchis pa'i phyogs de yang ma 'tshal lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des phyag brkyang ste sor mo lnga las 'od ka zer sna tshogs dag rab tu bkyel/ 
315b5(mdo): de nas 'od gzer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya thag dgu dang ka 'bum po dag snang bang byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing byi mjed da le bar du yang sdang bar byas so// des byang chub sems dpal de
315b6(mdo): dag gis mas cad dang ldan pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyi mjed 'di byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab cing nam mkha'i ngos kyang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dag gis khyab par mthong ngo // mabor nas
315b7(mdo): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
315b8(mdo): myi lached de byang chub sems dpal dag gis khyab ste/ de na gang byang chub sems dpal nag gis khyab paras gyur da pa'i go skabs ni tha nar kha ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang la saches par mthong legs so// de bzhin gshes
316a1(mdo): pa shaka kya thub pa yang bdag cag la ga bigs shing chos stond par mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brji de yon tan rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsa la pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
316a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa shaka kya thub pa ni kun tu gzigs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu dka'ajig rten gi mkhas myi mjed na sems can gang su dag sa la gnas pa 'am/ bar snang las gnas pa de dag las sems can re res yang 'di snyam du
316a3(mdo): sems te// de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ni thugs thams cad kyis bdag la gzigs shing / bdag gcig pu las baphams te chos ston do snyam du sems so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shaka kya thub pa ni kha dog dang / 
316a4(mdo): dbyibs gcig gis kyang kha dog dang dbyibs thams cad du chos ston par ma/ dzad de/ rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag ngas pa la dad pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa tshad
316a5(mdo): bA yang dag pa rjes su mthong zhing / tshangs pa'i bdag po chen po'i sgra skad kyi sa chos thos so// gang dag bdud la dad pa rnams dang / gang dag nyis ma la dad pa rnams dang / gang dag zla ba la dad pa rnams dang / gang dag
316a6(mdo): rnam thos kyi bu la dad pa rnams dang / gang dag 'phags skyes po la dad pa rnams dang / gang dag myig myi bzang la dad pa rnams dang / gang dag yul 'khor sbyang la dad pa rnams dang / gang dag dbang phyug chen po la dad pa'i bar gyi sem
316a7(mdo): can de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa dbang phyug chen po'i thad kyi gzugs dang kho dog dang dbyings su mthong zhi dbang phyug chen po 'tshi ga dang zla skad kyis chos thos so// de na 'odog dpo dbyibs dang dad pa dang
316a8(mdo): gzugs dang / sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi zer dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pa de bzhin du mthong zhing chos kyang zos so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid de yon tan
316b1(mdo): rgyal pos 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' gsas grags/ shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig gshos snang ba'i 'od gzer zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
316b2(mdo): khyed 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed du deng la/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la spyan myi mnga' 'am/ thugs bde 'am/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyan gsol cig/ byang chub sems
316b3(mdo): dpa' de dag gis gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mched dang / nam mkha' bcas pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ 
316b4(mdo): de sa dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang ma mchis na/ bdag cag kang tu gnas par bgyi lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu
316b5(mdo): dag sangs rgyas kyi zhang myi mched na ko skabs myed do/ zhes de skad dam zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs bshag zu/ ba pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa dag gas
316b6(mdo): ko skabs yangs pa yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis gsum la sku bas su 'gro ba dang / theg pa gsum gyi chos bstand pa las pasems te/ chos stond par mdzad pa dang / bslab pa gsum gyi sdon
316b7(mdo): bston par mdzad pa dang / rnam par thadad pa gsum kyi sgo gsum po dag ston par ma dad ba dang / sems can rnams ngan song gsul po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang / shi ba'i las gsum po dag la rab tu bkod par mdza
316b8(mdo): ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang bstand pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig na/ 'dul ba'i mem
317a1(mdo): can la gzigs shing ri brag myi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po myag ces bya ba gnas shing sa la'i phug na rnam par grol ba'i dga' dang bde ba thams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun las 'das
317a2(mdo): bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sa la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur da te/ de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang byed do// 
317a3(mdo): zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang / phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa shig kyi thub pa de la phyag bya ba deng / bsnyen bkur bya bal dang / chos nyan pa'i
317a4(mdo): phyir 'jig rten ka khams myi mched kyi ri de gang yin pa de logs su mngon tu 'phyogs de 'khod pa dang / rigs kyi bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shag kyi thub pa des 'khor rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dra mdzad pas/ 
317a5(mdo): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis po de dag gis sa la'i phug go skabs yangs par mthong zhing de bzhugs pa ra gyur da pa de ltar sa la'i phug de yangs pas dang de ltar rgya che bar gyur to// 
317a6(mdo): der byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpal rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dag gis mdapa byas nas/ der byang chub sems dpa' de des kyang rin po che sna bdun
317a7(mdo): ka khri stan dag mngon par sprul nas de la 'khor de chos nyan par byed do// rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa// las chos mnyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
317a8(mdo): kag kya thub pa'i zhabs la ni lan gsum mgo bos phyag byas nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dzajo// byang chub sems dpal de dag dong nas ring po la lon thams la'i phug de yang sngon ki ba bzhin du
317b1(mdo): gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no// grang bzhi pa den brgya byin ko'u shi ka la zhes bya ba che yongs su zad pa de hud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bas 'jigs skrag nas/ 
317b2(mdo): dwes sum bcu pa gsum pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 'grogs te sa la'i pus ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong te phyi nad nas/ gnod sbyin kyi dbang po myig gi gnas sa la'i phug gi
317b3(mdo): kho ra khor yug tu 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de 'di snyam bya sems te/ gang dag gis dri za'i bu gtsug pud lnga pa la bsra so ba btab se/ dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa des dbyangs snyan
317b4(mdo): pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon gsum du bstod na ni// de'ibacom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dag las bzhi ngas parapa 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas brgya byin ko'u shi kas dri za'i bu
317b5(mdo): gtsug bur lnga pa la gsol la btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus dri za'i bu gtsug phung lnga pas pi khang blangs te klu dang / rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa lnga brgyas bsngags pa brjod do// 
317b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu dag gang gi ji dri za'i bu gtsug pyad lnga bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stod pa bsum sa pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa des dbyangs snyan pa rnam par snang byed tog ces bya ba'i
317b7(mdo): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// ting nge 'dzin des 'jig rten gi khams kyi mdzad na gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / lha ma yin nas dang / nam mkha' sdod nas dang myi lo dzi nas dang / 
317b8(mdo): lto 'phye chen po rnaMs dang / dri za' rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thas cad dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad der 'byas par gyur to// gang dag dbyangs la dad pa de dag dbyangs thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur toto// 
318a1(mdo): gang dag bsngags pa dang / snyan pa la dga' ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags thos nas bcom ldan 'das de la shind tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / 
318a2(mdo): kus pa bskyed de rab tu dang bar gyur da to// gang dag gling bu'i sgra la dka' ba de dag gis ni sring bu'i sgra thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur da to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa ting nge 'dzind de las bzhengs te/ sa la'i phyag gi skor gzigs
318a3(mdo): pa dang / brgya byin nye bar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang tu mchi bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa des bka' stsa yang pa/ gnod sbyin dag ji snyed lhags pa rnams khyed cig de nas
318a4(mdo): sa la'i phug der ji ltar gnod sbyin gang ga'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye masnyed dag bzhugs te 'khod pa de ltar sa la'i phug de rgya che bar gyur da na/ sa/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa des 'khor de dag la 'di ltar chos
318a5(mdo): bstan te/ ji ltar 'khor de na gang dag / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag gi sa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam zos shing de dag la tung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag dgus rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// 'khor de na tha/ 
318a6(mdo): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de dag kyis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig thos so// den dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa las batshogs pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad ni bla na myed pa yang dag pa/ 
318a7(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub pas kyis spyi ldog pa la gnas par gyur dato// gang dag gis theg pa gsum ba dag tu sems pa snyed pa de dag pas khacig gis ni deng blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses bskye nga // de dag
318a8(mdo): khacig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed do// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed do// der brgya byin ko lu shi ke/ de yang 'jig pa las yongs su gros zhi tshe stong du rung nas blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs te/ 
318b1(mdo): byang chub las byer gyi ldog pa la gnas par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de ni de ltar ko skabs yangs pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yang 'di ltar rgya che ba yin te/ 
318b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor kyi mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung ba 'am bgrang bar myi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang rgya che ba yin te/ de bzhin
318b3(mdo): gshegs pa de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar myi nus so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku yang rgya che ba yin te/ de'i spyi gtsug blta ba pa'am/ sku'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar myi nus so// 
318b4(mdo): gal te de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mched de na sems can ji snyed ni dag 'dus par 'gyur da pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs bshagad kyi thub pa'i khong du zhugs par gyur da cig/ de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar
318b5(mdo): gyur da tam/ sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i sgon De cig tu zhugs shing 'byung bar gyur dkyang / de dag gis cher ra lha'i rkyo ga gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skul zho gcishe gi mtha' yang bring
318b6(mdo): 'am gang bar tshad gzung bar myi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shaka kya thub pa de'i sku ni de ltar rgya che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po dang
318b7(mdo): pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po ji snyed pa dag 'di ltar te/ dper na da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed bzhin tu sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur da pa'i sems can/ 
318b8(mdo): de dag thams cad/ da sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mched du zhugs par gyur da kyang / de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
319a1(mdo): tu sems skyed pa na smon lam de lta bu btab pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ste zhog go// rigs kyi bu dag thal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i
319a2(mdo): stong gi bye ma snyed po dag ltar rgya che ba dag 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed bzhin tu sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang bar kya dad pa'i sems can de dag thams cad/ de 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed
319a3(mdo): bya zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po sems bskyed pa na bla na myed pa yeng dag par shes thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam de lta bu btab pa na
319a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa zhag thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
319a5(mdo): gzhan dag las khyad par 'phags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis me tog zla ba mdag mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag long la nub phyogs logs su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong/ sangs rgyas
319a6(mdo): kyi zhing myi mched der de pa zhig/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de la snyur myi mngal 'am/ thugs bde 'am/ zhes kyang spyan gsol cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid yon
319a7(mdo): tran rgyal po des/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myeng pa dag thungs te byang chub sems dpa' gsang bslabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od gzer la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsa 'don/ 
319a8(mdo): rigs kyi su dag nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed du deng zhig/ de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol da pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
319b1(mdo): mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed du mchil legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid yon tan rgyal
319b2(mdo): pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi dag bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin tu dong shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' gsang bsgrags dang / snang
319b3(mdo): 'od gzer de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan gcig 'grogs te 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa de nas 'phags pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed der phyin de/ bya rgod
319b4(mdo): phung po'i ri li so sor 'khod nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyang ba btud de gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di nas shar phyogs logs su
319b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dku dang / tshig 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bgyi ba mchis te de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bkye
319b6(mdo): ba bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kyi tshogs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa sgrogs shing 'di skad tu/ sangs rgyas kyi rkang myi mjed de na de bzhin gshegs pa
319b7(mdo): kag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho shing gzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur da cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// des pa thams cad kyi dang por bran myed pa yang dag par
319b8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing bzhag ste/ rab tu gnas par byas so// de'i tshig gis ngas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa des pa dang
320a1(mdo): por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinan pa la gzhag pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni chos bzhi po de dag gi khyad par tu 'phags pa yin no// zhes ji skad sngor spos pI bar dag 'di skad gsungs/ 
320a2(mdo): te/ 'di skad de bzhin gshegs pa des me tog phra ba la dog mdzes drim byed pa 'di dag kyang bsrung shing / bcom ldan 'das lnga snyun gyi mang la' ma/ thugs bde 'am zhes kyang spyan ka mo la lags so// de bzhin du
320a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa'i gdan yang g.yos shing byang chub sems dpa' dag pa dag der 'dus par gyur da pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa'i gdan
320a4(mdo): g.yos par mthong ste/ yongs su zhus pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ji skar sA nyer smos pi bar de dag thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o// de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub seMs/ 
320a5(mdo): dpal dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la yongasu zhu ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa dag/ 
320a6(mdo): thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'dir lhags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu bsgrags pa dag mthar byin ma thag tu/ yang bcom ldan
320a7(mdo): 'das kyis lho phyogs logs kyi yongasu bsgrags pa bsams te/ rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khas mya nga
320a8(mdo): khams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba med pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan skyed pa'i dpas zhes bya ba dra gang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de sangang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i dus
320b1(mdo): pa khyod pan/ ngas thams cad kyi dang por bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa nas// ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no// de bzhin tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jam bu'i 'aces
320b2(mdo): bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rnam sgrogs shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lhun po rab gnas shes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gro ba ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan
320b3(mdo): dbang po li ba kam zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhong nor bu gzhir bkod pa ces bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa srid myed kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba
320b4(mdo): snying po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od 'byed yang dag pa sngags shes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsgyings pa yang dag/ bsags shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lha'i zla ba zhes bya/ 
320b5(mdo): de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang sangs kyi de zhing tsan dan gyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyas ra cho ga grags pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri mcho
320b6(mdo): ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ya du 'ong ba'i sgra dpyang ma [।]
320b7(mdo): bya'adang / sa rgyas kyi bco byed rje bung de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i thigs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zla sgrags shes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba dang / sangs
320b8(mdo): rgyas kyi 'ong sa dam par sgrogs zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna dbyangs yid tu'ang ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen khyam chog ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rini chen ngam zhes bya ba das
321a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen ljon gang 'bras bu dpag myed rin chen zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegags pa chos sprin sna dbyangs dbang phyug zla ba zhes bya ba dpa/ de bzhin du lho phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
321a2(mdo): ldan 'das dpag tu myed gra ngas myed pa dag gi gdan dag g.yos shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang / bstan pa dang grags pa da
321a3(mdo): brjod par mdzad pa dang / de'i tshe lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub sems dpa'i dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pa la yong su zhu ba dang chos
321a4(mdo): nyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'ding lpags pa'i bar tu ji sAdra sang smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
321a5(mdo): stsal da pa// rigs kyi bungs sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byo gas logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 'bum phrag da/ gu bcu rtsa 'dun 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gro gros nye bar
321a6(mdo): zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshol zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa gzigs de/ bcom ldan 'das de yang sngon byang chub sems dpar
321a7(mdo): gyur dacing byang chub sem 'dapa'i myang ba spyod pa na/ ngas thams cad kyi dang por bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa'i bar nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no// sas
321a8(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing nas kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mkhyen mdzod ces bya ba dang / ba krang grags pa rang/ kun tu snying po dang / tshangs bI me tog pa
321b1(mdo): sku mchog rnam par gnon dang / chos kyi/ shugs kyi sgron ma dang / lhun po phrag myed skra dbyangs rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dbyangs dang / de bzhin du ru phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
321b2(mdo): 'das dpag tu myed grangs myed paHga de dag dge mtshan dag de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pas yongasu bsgrags pa de dag gis bdan dag g.yos shing de'i tshe na chub phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi pho nya byang chub sems
321b3(mdo): dpal dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog za ba mo dag mdzes dri ma myed pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'dir lhags shing 'khor pa'i bar tu ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin
321b4(mdo): tu srung ngo // de bzhin tu byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du ste pa dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du shar lho dang / de bzhin du lho rub dang / de bzhin du nub byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar kyi phyogs rnaMs su
321b5(mdo): yang snga ma bzhin du sbyab te brjod par byo'o// yang bcom ldan 'das sha ka kya thub pas bka' stsa khad pa// rigs kyi phungs sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shad kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
321b6(mdo): kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba'i zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa nam zos kyi bu sa la
321b7(mdo): 'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bsngon byang chub sems dpa' gyur da cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
321b8(mdo): byang chub pha rol tu phyind pa drug ki 'ang dag yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa nas/ thams cad kyi dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag gi zad du phul nas la/ 
322a1(mdo): sa kyi bu dag bye ga sangs rgyas kyi nid gyi mjed du/ nga'i tshig gimi tsan gnan sa btsun gyi mnga' 'a/ thug pa pade / bdes
322a2(mdo): sa kyi lo ga yod pa/ na pa sems dang ldan pa'i mangs rgyas kyi ning kyi mdzid kyim dang
322b1(mdo): ston pa nga gas sa son pa ma / 'i dogs da pa yang ba dang / ma'i ses gsum po dag pa tud yod ca mang
322b2(mdo): phyir/ de bzhin gshegs so'i thug pa rje dang bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs bzhag kya thub pa de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
322b3(mdo): ring po ma len pa'i dus shig na/ 'dul ba'i sems can la gzigs shing ri brag myi mnyam pa'i dbus na/ gnod sbyin dbang po myagi ces bya ba'i gnas shing sa la'i phun
322b4(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun las/ 'da' bar ma dzad cing bzhugs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sa
322b5(mdo): yug thams cad khyab par gyur te/ de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs mi zan song bani tsam kyi rtos kyang myed do// lag bdun po de 'das pa dang / 
322b6(mdo): byags brgyanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag zheg zag bcu gnyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub pa des phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen kur bya ba dang / chos mnyan du'i
322b7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi 'ams kyi mjed de de dag gang yin pa de logs su mngon tu phyogs te 'khod pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub pa de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos po'i po de dag gis
323a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ka zhwadag la khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad smos pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes rI ma myed pa 'di
323a2(mdo): dgal pa la/ lho nub kyi phyogs logs su rang rang gas ji skar mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed des de shig/ ra'i tshi ki kis de bzhin gshegs pazhas kya thub pa de la bsnyun mya mnga' 'am/ thugs
323a3(mdo): bde 'am/ zhes kyang bstun gsol cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sa la'i rgyal po dos me tog zla ba mdog mdzes tra mi myed pa dag blangs te
323a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug byed ce mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod la byin nas/ 'di skad ces bka' sra lang to// rigs kyi bu dag pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed
323a5(mdo): sa byed caka 'jig rted gi choms gyi mdzod du depanin ded srog cags nyi khris kyang gas sadu hA/ btsud pa bcwos ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / de bzhin gshegs bzhid kyi
323a6(mdo): ma pa / ma khyen mi sa sas rgyas gyi ma gyi ma kyi
323b1(mdo): sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no// de bzhin du de'i tshen
324a1(mdo): 'dus par gyu rad pa de dag thams cad kyi sems can re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam du gyu rang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed thams cad de lta bu'i sems cadan dag gis khyab par gyur pa to/ 
324a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sa dang / nam mkha' thams cad sems can de dag gis khyab par gyur te/ gang du sems can dag gis ma khyab par gyur rad pa'i skabs ni/ tha da myig sman gi thur la/ gzugs pa'i
324a3(mdo): rnam tha ma yang byed do// sems cad dreg thams cad kyis kyang / de bzhi gshegs pa zhag tu grub pa mthong ba martogs par dam mkha' stong pa sa thod da pang kyi/ gtsug gis ni mi mthong // dang
324a4(mdo): byig sam du mi ba dang / tham sug dang / masos chen dang / rirnams kyang snang bar ma gyur to// 'jig rten gi bang dag kyang kyi snang / lha'i ga' sa byed 'a rnams kyang myi snang ste
324a5(mdo): 'og tu gser gi 'khor lo la thug pa'i bar dang / de snying sa gzhi yang phyi'i lam du snang bam sa gyur to// de nas na pa ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' khyab chos gsas zhim tu stsa
324b1(mdo): tshogs dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang po'i skyed mos tshal dag mthong na/ shing ljon pa ras bcos bu sA tshags dang / gos sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpung rgyar dang
324b2(mdo): mu tig gi tshun po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de dag mthong ba dang / sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag skyed mos tshal de ltar 'dong ngo snyam nas/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed kya
324b3(mdo): khongasu chud par gyur da pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / ka shin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa na dpyod pa
324b4(mdo): rnams ma rtogs pas/ sems can lhag ma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'i zhonas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i srin nang du zhugs par gyus te// den pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa 'phrul
324b5(mdo): dang ga mang dus te/ brnam pa dang / nganas thams cad dag/ ga gi su ma nas / ra bzhin gshesakya thul bkas / byang chub sems dpa' byams
325a1(mdo): 'dod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdu 'brus dang / rnam par 'thul pa'i tshe 'phrul yin te/ gang ga phyi bdag cags pad pa mdzad pa ma spyod bcos ston par mdzad cing / de'i phyir khyed pa mas
325a2(mdo): cad kyi mi somam shig/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i'ikhor rnams kyis/ thal mo sbyar ba btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba myod po'i chos thams cad bstan to// de la bde ba myod pa'i chos thams
325a3(mdo): cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'khor ba'i 'dam las bskal pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzud pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzud pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
325a4(mdo): rang 'thu ni na pa so su rdzogs par bya'o// de la bsam nyan pa gzung ba'i sems 'byed pa yongs su bsngo ba rnam pa cu ste/ 'jig ste/ 'dapa dang ma ze yang dasu par bskyed pa'i phyi sem sa da
325a5(mdo): thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems kyis gnas pa dang / sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral pa'i phyir/ gru chen po yang dag par sgrub pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir phyin ci log las yongs su
325a6(mdo): 'ar bar bya ba'i phyir mabral 'akrol ba'i gos dang / chos bdas byed par ma yi btag pa'i phyir/ se ge'i ni tshed pas kyi zheg pa'i g.yo dang / chos thams pa smra ba dang / byis pa dang / rkyen yom lta bu brton pa
325a7(mdo): pa'i phyir 'jig rted gi 'ams thams cad du 'grob rig ma dang / tshul khrims kyi rungs yong sud palags kyi 'jig rten gi kham pa mams cad ldang bas brgyad par byed pa'i gocha dang / b.ros tubyi pa
325a8(mdo): byo du rdzogs par bya bar byor/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i stobs pacu yongs su grub pa'i gomong / rid smras pa bzhi dubyed pa'i phyir/ kyi rigs pa 'i gas pa'i nimadang / chu sem
325b1(mdo): rnams kyi ji ltar thob pa'i chos sgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ba bdag la yun po'i go cha dang / grom pa myed pa ste/ de dag ni bde ba pyod pa'i chos thams cad la gzud pa rnam pa bcu'o// 
325b2(mdo): mtshan nyid myed pa'i sgo yongs su zhes la rtogs pa'i myod pa dang / chos thams cad bdag myed par yid la byed pa dang / sems skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed par rtogs pa gang yin pa ni/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa yin te/ de la ni
325b3(mdo): 'jug pa dang ldog pa chad cing / rtag pa myed pa dang / gdeg pa myed pa dang / gzhag pa myed pa yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong bar zhugs pa ni/ sems can gang ka'i klung
325b4(mdo): dung gyur zag brgyad kyi bye ma snyed/ blan myed pa yang ngag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur to// de byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po// bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa
325b5(mdo): snying po de dag gis mi/ gzungs dang / bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs po mi gyur nganas/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sgo dag nas 'thon pa dang / ngo mchad du gyur nga nas bcom ldan 'das
325b6(mdo): kyi rnams mamaso 'os rgyan 'jas te/ de bzhin gnadam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sku'i ched brtag pa'i phyir/ phyogs pa nga rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ngo // de byang chub sems dpal na phyogs
325b7(mdo): son sangs rgyas kyi 'di dbag na byed grangs byed pa dag 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhas kya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyis 'khoran nyes pa pa byed pa'i/ des yang cigi dang / don dang / mi'i 'byu ba pa sna tshogs kyi sa
325b8(mdo): skyes pa'am phra bar gyi mngon pa mang bzhin gnanas ma zhag kya thub pa ma khyen ldan/ 'dug pa 'tshang/ namams pa de bzhin ru ba mas pas men/ gzhag mam de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub pa'i sku/ byang chub
325b9(mdo): tshums te/ ji ka de bzhin gshegs pags kya thus pa'i spyan sngan 'dug pa'i cha/ ma mtham pa de bzhin du 'i rtso mazab po// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thul pa'i skul pa gyis pa'am/ dri bar gyi
326a1(mdo): sems dpa' dang / nyan zos dang kis khyal par snang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kyathub pa su
326a2(mdo): gcig na yang byang chub/ sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag 'jug cing / 'byung bar snang ngo // de bzhin du sbru'i sgo gnyis pa nas/ spu'i sgo thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang 'jug cing
326a3(mdo): 'thung bar snang ste/ phyogs bcu'i bar du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khong par zhugs par gyur pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
326a4(mdo): sku'i sgo das nas phyir 'thon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum sker pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dod dang / tshag dang / yi ge 'bru dang
326a5(mdo): sgra dang / brjod pa snga mod dan kyis bstod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod do// de nas de'i modo la 'dod pan pyod pa dang / gzugs na pyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis spos dang / me tog
326a6(mdo): 'phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs pa'i char dag kyang rab tu pha pa ste/ lha'i sil snyan dag kyang rab tu bsil nas/ lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtsha/ na dang / ba dan dang / na bza' dang / ras bcos bu dang / rgyan
326a7(mdo): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba la phyir/ brtson par gyur to// der byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs myed yang dag 'dren ces bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das gas pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud rje
326a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di snyed ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lung bstan pa chen po'i/ mdo sde 'di'i mying mi legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam
326b1(mdo): ting nge 'dzin go sgo rtog pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / snying rje pad ma kar po zhes bya
326b2(mdo): ba'o// yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi zhu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs su bcad
326b3(mdo): pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bkyed ba de/ bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyum lags/ bka' stsal dpa/ ram de'i bsod nams lngar yang smras te/ de yang mdor bsdus te brjod par bya'o// 
326b4(mdo): gapal la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa dang / gang ma 'ongs
326b5(mdo): pa'i dus lnga brgya pa na/ tha na bris te 'chang bar byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang bar bskyed par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po bcu'i bar du/ pha rol tu phyin
326b6(mdo): ba drug la gyod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang / bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dacu dang / 
326b7(mdo): bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / klu dang / dri ba dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / ga pa dang / mye'im ci dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten ka sdang ba'i sems rag tu dang bar bya ba dang
326b8(mdo): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / zab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / thod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / redus ma yin po'i chub dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang / nad thams cad rab
327a1(mdo): tu zhi bar bya ba dang / mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dbade bar bya ba dang / lo legs par bya ba dang / nad byed par 'tshogs par bya ba dang / zag pa rnams 'jigs pa myed cing
327a2(mdo): nga 'ar bya ba dang / nyid mam mnye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i mi ma rnam par 'phes par bya ba dang / song gsum kyi thug bsngas las blang par bya ba dang / len pa gsum so ga nimam yang dag par 'a
327a3(mdo): myi rigs pa 'phreng byer gi gnas su 'dug par bya ba'i phyir ram chos kyi rna bkang pa 'di bgad pa'i phyir so// chos kyin bgrangs 'di bu'i mig tud la bya bu nin lnga brgyags la
327b1(mdo): de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gnod sbyin dang slob 'asod rams lhun po de khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yul dpa/ drang srong bsod nams
327b2(mdo): khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zur la/ lnga brgya tha ma la phyir myo ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba'i bar dag ka rna lam du sgrogs shig/ de dag kyang phyir myi ldog pa'i sems skyed du chug shika/ 
327b3(mdo): gsolang pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag smon lam gyis/ bskal pa chen po brgya ma rtsa bzhi 'das pa nas/ gnod sbyin kau deng srong gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
327b4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi khyad pa pyod pa da / bdag gis sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag tshangs gnas bzhi po dang / la rab tu bkod cing / phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la yang bkod lags te/ 
327b5(mdo): bdag gis sems can kar dag/ lnga brgya tha ma pa la chos kyi na ma grang 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / gang dag 'di las tshig bzhi po tshig su bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag kyang / bdag
327b6(mdo): nyid kyis yongs su byin par bkyi sa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' ma yang nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / myi du lha ma yin dang / dri'i bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang
327b7(mdo): ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa snying rje pang bkar po zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs so//

328a1(mdo): deg ma nyam mid ma la sa dang / ba na tu/ 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi'i phreng bached po// kyang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las na m+b+ha'angam mtshan po gas ma 'a
328a2(mdo): brta pa yong su bcwob chen po'i khyim tha zhes bya ba'o// sangs rgyas dang / bya ba chub sems dpa' thams sadas phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das da bu ched po rdorje rin po che'i rtse mo la zhugs nas

328a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' thamam dpa' chen pom ban pa'i sdom pa blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed parje'i bdag nyid la/ de bzhid gshegs pa thams pad mnyes par bya

328a6(mdo): maca du so sa 'bras ni mchibar/ de bzhin gshegs pa langal pa chen ponyon rnams dang / byang rgya na sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma ched po brnyes pa rnams kyis mdes zhing bdas
328b1(mdo): la rtag tu bsod nams kyi stobs chen po dang / ye shes kyis nye bar brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtson pa'i bdag nyid dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i gnas dang / mngon par shes pa dang /

328b3(mdo): bci bas bcings pa/ brtson rang chud pa/ chos kyi lam stor pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra bdo bas mngon par ches pa/ mgron ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ skyob pa ma mchis pa/ gnas ma mchis pa

328b7(mdo): mya ngan ga 'tshe bas ches pa/ bde ba ma thob pa/ mya sreg pa ma thob pa/ rtag tu mnyam par ma gzhag pa/ zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / sbyin pa dang / nges pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bag yod pa
328b8(mdo): dang bral ba/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / sa dang / bzod pa dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa rnams la gnas pa dang bral ba/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la

329a3(mdo): ba/ yod tad kyis stong ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni gos kyis ma g.yogs pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bgrod pa dang thal ba/ sdug bsngal brgya stong phrag du mas mngon par rje
329a4(mdo): rtag tu chungs pa'i rtag tung banang/ rtag tu mongs pa rtag tu ma nyam param kA'as pa/ rtag tu nyon mongs pa'i rdzas su dbyugs pa lags na/ thugs rje chen pos dgongs te/ bang

329a6(mdo): dug pol/ debazhini gshegs ngamachun nas/ ga ga yu mum tshanam pa thams cad ya rdzogs yang mdzad drugapas/ ba'i mams bcu dang / kyi 'jigs pa na dang / 
329b1(mdo): phra 'a mams ca sa mchod pa dang / 'gyur gyi srin po 'byom nas dang gyu to/ phyogs 'acu'i 'jig cid gi sems na bkod pa chen po rnams kum bya gnas pa di po che

329b5(mdo): gser gi ni cong mang po sa btags pa rnams/ bad na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gi ser gyi gyi sar zhen po can rnams dang gser ki 'phreng ba rnams dang / gsem 'i ga la sa byed 'ang rnam
329b6(mdo): dang / rin po che'i smon rnams dang / ring po che'i 'bru'i cher rnams dang / rin po che'i snying po can gyi khang bzangs migs pa nor bu rab mchog sna tshogs kyis sras pa/ rin po che'i len kan
329b7(mdo): can rnams dang / rigs sngags 'chang chen po'i skyed mos tshal nyams dgal ba rnams dang / gnas nyams dka' ba rnams dang / gzhal myed khang nyams dga' ba rnams dang / lha'i skyed mos tshal nyas
329b8(mdo): danam pa rnam pa dang / lha'i nye bar khyad pa nyams dga' ba yongs su ma gyud pa ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo// gangadag 'jas
330a1(mdo): gang dag 'jam bu'i gro med mchis po'i sman rnam pa lnga tshogs rnams dang / bcud kyis len ga rigs rnams dang / gang dag rdus thams cad pa'i nor bu dang / gang dag 'azhal bas so
330a2(mdo): nam po thun su ma chogs pa khyang bar du 'phags pa rnam sa dang / gang dag dri gda' ba'i sngon zhing rnams dang / ca dan ni sngon 'di rnam pa sna cogs dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / tsad dan dam 'o rnam
330a3(mdo): dang / rtag tu ma tog dang ldan pa'i dag pa chas chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngang rgyam pa yang dumam pa'i dri gdal ba'i sdon zhing ga rigs rnams dang / gang dag dpag bamam zhing 'dag gi ba ma mas
330a4(mdo): shing / yongs su 'dzin pa la mchis pa rnam pa dang / gang dag/ rgya mtsho'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams dang / yid zhin gi nor bu rnams dang / gang dag ri lhun po rnams dang /

330b1(mdo): kyang canas pas 'gros pa sa dang 'byod 'arnams dang / gang dag na su 'i kyi'i tshogs gnas byed 'a skong ba rnams na gnas shing gad stan pa byid parnams dang / gang dang da mtshar sngon phyangasatshon banyan par 'byi de 'arnams dang / gang dag gdus phyi dang bu nas dang / gal

330b7(mdo): sna tshogs pa'i yin rnams dang / mar me'o snod stong gi 'jig rten po 'jig rten gi khams kyi ched tsa ma la bI zhim po la'i'abru mang gis yongs su bkang zhing/ snying po'i ras mi rab brgya'i chad tsam rab tu 'bar
330b8(mdo): rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / byang chul sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo// de dag sems cad la gsol ba ni/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dus
330b9(mdo): ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chob kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed sa rnams la / sems can rnams kyi don bskal pa mang por bzhugs par gsol yod
331a1(mdo): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mya dmyigs par bzhugs te/ bsngos pa ltar bdag gi bsod nams thams cad/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar
331a2(mdo): bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nas la rjes su yi ring ngo // sdig pa thams cad ma sor bshags so/ 
331a3(mdo): oM s+phar slar/ bi ma na skar/ me ha dza ba hUM// des 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du/ lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rin po che'i srin rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir sngar 'byung 'am 'gyur
331a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas la daphyogs pa/ yid la byed pas yongs su bsngo ba chen po la 'khor lo 'di nyid pararam/ mtshan po 'dod na
331a5(mdo): desdig pa rnams mang par 'byung zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang bslabs par 'gyur ro// gang du zlab pa'i yon tan rnams kyang thoza par 'gyur ro// yan cig bzlas brjod byas na

331b1(mdo): sa po dang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams#/ 'di ga ba gis thos bdus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po na/ 'angs la

331b6(mdo): pa byed pa dang / gzug pa na myed pa'i sta gan dang / gzha dag dang / grwa dang gnad sbyin dngo chen po dang / nyam pani dang / nam mthal ldi dang / kyi'am nga/ pa ste lam ches po gnanas
331b7(mdo): gzhan grangs myed dpag tu byed pa dag kyang lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gyen du lta zhing bcom ldan 'das ring po myi thogs par mthar phyin pa/ nam ma thal lngar snang la byang chub sems
332a1(mdo): nga ma pa dang / byung brdzun pa kyad mkhas pa 'as pasung zhan bstod pan sa dus
332a2(mdo): mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsems cad pa dang nam kha'i lam gang bar gyur cing / dadung bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rmyi bstan pa sa tshim par gyur nas/ thal mo dag rab tu sbyar te/ ma ldan 'a
332a3(mdo): khon la lta zhing 'khong ba na/ dper na nad pa dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / chu bos khyer pa dag rtswa 'gran du lto bar byed pa bzhis dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur ba dag skyabs lnga lta bar byed pa pa ni/ 
332a4(mdo): te de ltar mya midzod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang / na mkha'i lam byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / brgya byini dag na/ lto 'phye chen po la dbang po dag ka per
332a5(mdo): 'do pa pyod pa dang / gzugs na myong ba'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag das kyi dang rgya ma yin pa rnams gzhanasagazhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa rol kyi
332b1(mdo): na chub pa dang 'byung brlan pa ma byar/ ras pa'i gnas pa bzhin / stan// rlung lag su 'ong ster sa 'gyur bar/ sems dmyas 'gro mastong ba ma dad pa ma/ tshul gcig ldan
332b2(mdo): ma tha la bying ba shA byed/ ma / da skye rlung sa su sa gsu
332b3(mdo): skye 'o mang med pa sa// da/ mas da // den sems ca sa dang pa'i gyung gro
332b4(mdo): ma pa'i kyi zod pa pa mad pa sa/ ma mam ldan 'das kyi'i tsham pa pa ma'ab ba'i 'a las 'di med sa bam// gang ngag sdom pa
333a1(mdo): myod ba kyad ci'i spyod 'gyur ba// de dag nyan thos rnams sa// nam yang dga' bar gyi bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos la mnyam sa 'gyur ba'i// ung ba gnyis pa gzhan byed de// de ni yang dang yang du yang
333a2(mdo): tu pa yod// grod na pos rgyas rnams/ na dun / sa rgyamardzogs par 'gyur/ nas pa'i ldan thams can 'di/ 
333a3(mdo): 'dir 'gas pa dang / bams pa 'dod pa sten ma byed// khams cad kyi drug yog su med// 'du sems cad lalas pakang// bya rgyab mchog zhugasu ga // gang po gzungs dpa' dod ci
333a4(mdo): rdzopa pa yang na/ 'dzin gyi / na napad / kyis / mas na
333a5(mdo): mdzad ci'i/ ma 'di byen gas brlabapa pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyed kyis kyang // zhi 'dis ni rtse bar byos// de bzhin bzod pa dag gis ces/ bsdams das kun tsa mi gnas par byos/ gro
333a6(mdo): theg pa ngas bshad de// sems can chags lam par bya zhes// phung po dag dang khams rnams dang // skye mched stong pa ngas bshad do// zhiganas rnam pa su gsum dang / lhag mthong nga sa bdang bya zhes/ 
333b1(mdo): ngams dam pacings pa'o// thams cad de yis rnam papa 'gyur// sems can rnams la snying kyims// nyan thos rnams kyi 'de pa 'de// chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang
333b2(mdo): sa pade/ khrid pa ma so// byang chu ba sa yang nyi sa ba pa
333b3(mdo): litam ni gyi mdzad do snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe byang da pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad 'di sarnam du sems te/ kye ma da ltar de 'azhin gshegs pa 'di ni sangs
333b4(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'dibs yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dang / ma'o sa pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis dkon mchog gsum gi gdung rgyur
333b5(mdo): kyi 'chang bar bya ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sku ma yon dang / nam mkhal ldidi dang / rgyal mo tsho dang / ltom skye chen po dang / kyi dang myim yin pa
333b6(mdo): dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang / rad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang / chos la gnos pa dag dang / yon tan gi phyug pa dang / 
333b7(mdo): dang / tshul khrims kyi dri dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang / rnam par tho 'tsham pa myed par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang krol ka bide ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyim dang / cinas
334a1(mdo): rkyen pon tad/ par bya bar gyu dang/ phyogs rdzun nas na sa na pa dang / sa dang / 
334a2(mdo): su gyu par bya bye ba ca 'du yang dag 'ag par pa'ad bsam ni ni gshes sdom dus ma durjod/ ga pa dkyis pa'i phreng du kyi mo ngas
334a3(mdo): dpa' chen po gang da bskal pa brgyas ngam par gyung ba dag da dag sa dang gas kyi lci ba'i pa 'od pas ka du dang / bdas sas rgyas kyi rom ma rnam pa
334a4(mdo): na #la pa dang / dang/ la pa pa kye 'dusmra 'a dung napa
334b1(mdo): mdzub pa'i snang la med po rgya che ba de na sum 'jig nyid rgyal bar gyur to// de dag gi sum las mchog tu sems pan ga' dag gisus dang sems kyi med pa la reg pa dang / dge ba dang rab tu tshim par byed pa da na btsun padag rgyas pa
334b2(mdo): sa ldan pa byang ba'i na med pa gsum sa @ ba tu ni/ sa kyi dzi
334b3(mdo): cad padus rnam pa 'gapa / dang ma ba dag dang / den dun ga yan tan la / @ da' par gyu/ di'i tshis sa rgya kyi ni phyogs yulo gang ga'i klung gi byes snyed kyi
334b4(mdo): ga/ sangs rgyas kyims la 'dres pa po rgyad pa sa rnamasam tsham ma shes sa mams pa da/ nga/ 'dags pa them pa'i seng de dag dedas sa mas kyi ning kyi sa gcig nga ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji du

335a1(mdo): pa de dag gi lus de 'dra ba kho na'i 'od byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong ka dge 'dun gas yongasu bskor nas/ nyan thos chen po rnams la bka' myal pa/ khyod bsam gtan ni
335a2(mdo): yul gyi mthul ltos gis/ byin gi rlabs kyi rgyas bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams cad kyi yum zil gyis mnadu nas/ sngon po de bzhin gzhags pa thams cad kyis 'di ba chos kyi tshul gyi dkon mtshan
335a3(mdo): gsus kyi rjeng rgyum cang pa'i phyi dang / gsal bar mdad pa'i phyim gyi mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad yongs spyad pa mdzad do// de ba'idi dung kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
335a4(mdo): grangs myed dpag tu myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsam gtan dang mngon par zhes po'i lus la rnam par nye ba dang ldan pa dag gis mya mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i
335a5(mdo): byi dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya ma tsa dang / snyom phye chen po dang / myi ring myi mi yin pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba'i phyi dang / dad parna
335a6(mdo): mi 'dres par bya ba'i phyir sems ca tsam mi mi bzod pa dang dang kyim gnas pa dang dang / kyis byug pa da dang / sem sa la bang dang sun par byu pa na po'i
335a7(mdo): par bya ba yid no// don de nyid byid kyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gi yul dag gas nam pa me bar byed do// sa phyogs gang dang gang
335b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'khod cing / bsam gtad gi yul pa dag gise rnam par med par byed pa de dang deng/ da ltang dpapa 'ongs pa'i dus na yang kha cig dul sa pa'adas nas sems can
335b2(mdo): 'khar pa'i 'jigs pas phrag cing/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa dag dang / sku gdung gi mchod rten dag byed du 'dug par 'thur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs khang dag ka pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gas
335b3(mdo): ngag tu 'gyur // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag song bcu'i zil mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bka' stsa ya to// de dag gi mchod pa de nas/ nga nyid kyis bzhes par mdzad de/ thams can de dag pos
335b4(mdo): zad ni/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir myi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro// sa phyogs la la ni chug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / 'chag sa dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / skyed po mtshas das
336a1(mdo): ku ga' ba dag btunas par byed / yang byed pas chos kyi sa gnas pa rnams la mchong ba dang / rib 'gronas pa ldathogs 'dig / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mam
336a2(mdo): stan dbang pa'i gsos smad dang / yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba/ byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro// mug lag khang dang 'chag sa dang / dgod pa'i gnas de dag tu'ang bkur stir byas te/ chos nyan pa dang / 
336a3(mdo): rnam par rtan la dbab pa'i rtim byed pa dag tu 'gyur ba 'am/ glegs pa ma dag klog par 'gyur ro// ug lag khang dang / 'chags la sogs pa de dag tu ya pa yongs su tong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su tong bar gyur ba te
336a4(mdo): 'di ste ste ning ga ke'i 'as khyim ga ka'i 'am/ kun dag las rig na'am than dang / zam pa dang / grang ba ma dang / rta dbang mo dang / bgrang dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / thugs gzhan dag dang / sdod kyad kyi sa da
336a5(mdo): rnas pa tshogs pa// des 'ang myong bar 'gyur ning / mas kyis gnas pa rnams yongs myod par bya ba'i phyi ma dang dag la byed rnam pa snga sogs dang / 
336a6(mdo): rgyu gdon dang / sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang / rnal 'byor kyi tshig sa kyi do dang / byang grol gdod kyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzob rag tu byed do// da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
336a7(mdo): ga mas man gdags pa'i phyir songs tong ba dam pa gatshogs pa/ songs su stong bar byed do// de ba'i'i du sems cad de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsodenapas bya ba'i dngos pa de thams cad ma cinas kyis
336a8(mdo): sems cad de dag 'bras bun por 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nga'i rjes su zhugs 'ang par mdzad / gzhes par mdzad do// sems can log par srung ba'i chos ma yin yang ngang 'gro gsum rnam par spangs pa dengs/ 
336b1(mdo): ma pa bzhin du than pa gsum gas byi gyi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro// sems can de dag sun da srid du'a'ar bar 'khor bar byung ba de mo dus pa yongs myod gnyis chos kyi so pa spyod dang / byang bang gi so
336b2(mdo): spyod dab gyi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// ra rab dgas khrod dang zhi ljon pa chen po dang dgon pa dang / nags 'dab gang yang nung skye/ da ltar dang pa 'ongs pa'i ma na tha ra pa don du gnyer sa/ chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong
336b3(mdo): ma dang drug pa snyed dang dge bsnyen ma smra basbyang pa sadag dang ma bsnyungs pa da / dang / nang du yang dag / 'jog gi tshul dang brnam pa dang / tshul bzhin du yongs byur ba dang / 'jam pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lta
336b4(mdo): nadang sbyi da/ kyang gnas par 'gyur ro// dge slong da/ 'dul pa dzin pas ma tan gyi sa kyi margyal sa 'dud pam ba kyi ses ga ma sum thos kyis padan das/ sngon bzhidi gdonas
337a1(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod par dag tu byed do// da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i byas na ra'i bstan pa 'di dang / dam pa'i chos sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzug brnyan jisade gnas par chos kyis gnas pa dge slong rnaMs la khyim dang
337a2(mdo): kun dka' ra ba dang / zhing dang bran dang bran mo'i par gang su dag kas de ltar bsngos pa de la/ sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa kang dka/ tha na 'dab ma gcig dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / me tog gcig
337a3(mdo): yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na/ de ni blun pa de la don ma yin pa dang / phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de la gnod pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs thams cad du myi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yI ya dza po
337a4(mdo): dang / nye tu dang / sAg gi gnyen mtshams dang / mkhan po dang slob dang ngan dang / rim gro ba stug ci yid tu 'ong ba dag dang / myu ra tu bral bar 'a gyur ba yin/ nad tshabs chen po yun ri pa dag gse thebs par 'gyur ba
337a5(mdo): yin/ del chos gos dang lhung bzed gang yod pa de yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur ba yin no// lnga gang dag gis zhe na/ 'di lta ste// rgyal po dang chom rkun dang / me dang chu dang / bko skal la spyod pa mya
337a6(mdo): mdza ba dang / lnga po de dag gis so// del 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myu du 'grub par 'gyur ba yang yin te/ bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po myi bzad
337a7(mdo): bar skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de gal te rgyal res 'ga' zhig tus rire shig 'das nas/ sems can dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas/ 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du hud 'gro dang yi dgas kyi re ge su 'ong ba dang / 
337a8(mdo): na lag myed pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang / skos pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal gas su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/ gal te brgyal nges 'ga' zhig tus ring zhin
337b1(mdo): nas nas// de nas kyi 'tho man/ so 'argya stong mang po dag tu skus gtugs sor brgyas pa bdag gin du skye bar 'gyu ba yin te/ brgyal nges 'gal zhig de nas ni 'phos nas// gal te gyi rnams kyi nab cu skyes na/ 'an kyang
337b2(mdo): na snyigs na na pa/ byung ba kyi nyid sems pa rnyed pas cung dang / drenas padang / nas tshogs par 'argyas dang / gyigs yang 'dang / ma ba dang / gapa' mtshang ba dang / rgyas
337b3(mdo): khyod kyis rnas sa ga shing/ kyag klungs ni bsas pa dang / 'dam tha' dang / byan dang 'dan nyas pa dang / rbag dang dben pa dang / lam gyi chen sa na 'tsho ba gyungs// de de sa na seMms ras kyang / yang mos cad dmya
337b4(mdo): nas kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir// de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yi na pa/ de ltar lci ba 'byung zhen/ 'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slo de ni/ 'di lta chos kyis gnas pa'i nas la/ khyim dang shing dang kun rag
337b5(mdo): ra ba dang / zan dang bran mo dang / byugs dag gi bang bsngos pa dag thogs ras/ gang zag rang gi yongs su yongs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/ sdig pa pyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni/ de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ban
337b6(mdo): sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul myed par bya ba dang / na bar gzhag pa dang / rgyur gcad pa dang / chub par bya ba'i phyir 'tshon pa yin no// de bzhin tu dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myed par bya ba nas/ nub par bya/ 
337b7(mdo): bar bya brtson po yin no// de 'i'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs dang ldan pa yin la/ chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te/ de'i phyir de nyid kyi phyi
337b8(mdo): 'dod pa'i 'bras surnam par sbyin pa'i gyi ba mngon par 'grub pa yin na// de nas gnas btan gala'ang srung 'dim thags nas/ 'di skad ces gsos to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyid rnyed pa ni la la ba kyang gyi
338a1(mdo): bsngo'i bar tu byung nas/ bza ba dang / btung bI slad du log par sgrub pa ni/ de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ka ya 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin
338a2(mdo): te/ gang du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bre'i 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no// 'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig myi nyid 'thob par rnyed par dka' ba rnyed de
338a3(mdo): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang / zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba ro mtshar rmad du byung ba'i bar du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos
